Dr. Pearle Partial Knee Replacement
3. Find out if you qualify
Obtain An Evaluation Now

Living with Knee Pain and Considering Total Knee Replacement? Know your alternatives — less invasive knee resurfacing procedures exist and you may be a candidate! You can be evaluated by Dr Andrew Pearle, an international expert in knee surgery, to help determine which approach may be appropriate for you.
Jul 2010
HealthTap gets a home: 575 High St.

After several months at HealthTap's first headquarters (Ron Gutman's whiteboard-equipped home office), we opened our doors at 575 High Street in a Palo Alto office suite formerly occupied by the FBI. It was a suitable location for top secret development work. There we created the new concept of Interactive Health.
Sep 2010
The first ever Hacking 4 Health

HealthTap hosts the first ever health data-specific Hackathon with support from the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), the HHS CTO, and HealthTap fan Todd Park. Hundreds participated and 35 teams created 18 apps in less than 24 hours.
Dec 2010
Giving back for the holidays
Private Beta Launch

We opened our doors to a limited audience of new moms and expecting women at the end of 2010. After previewing technology to investors in Nov, we started with hand-picked users in late 2010 and received immediate, positive, and validating feedback.
Jan 2011
Planning the future

Following months of intense work to release HealthTap to our Beta community, we gathered for our first annual planning retreat to set our goals for 2011. The retreat helped spark many new ideas and established a roadmap and metrics for success.
Hello, Dr. Tappy!

We care about care and positivity. Dr. Tappy, the smiling image of the helpful physician, was created and immediately became an integral part of the HealthTap experience. Always helpful and happy, Dr. Tappy symbolizes HealthTap's dedication to providing the best, most reliable, health information to everyone at all times.
Feb 2011
:) we're on TED!

HealthTap CEO and Founder Ron Gutman's TED talk on the "Hidden Powers of Smiling" created buzz at the 2011 conference, but the ultimate success of the talk came when it was released online. Today, the talk has been viewed by millions, translated into more than 50 languages by enthusiastic viewers across the world and published as a TED book.
Walking healthy
Cool consumer health projects come with even cooler swag! Introducing the HealthTap shoe – if you see them on someone's feet, say hi!
Mar 2011
Angel funding announced

HealthTap's angels include some of the best and brightest company builders in Silicon Valley and beyond. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to create the HealthTap you see today. Read article ›
The first Interactive Health Symposium

HealthTap hosted the first Interactive Health Symposium right in our office, attracting physician participants from across the state. The symposium created the foundation for a robust, ongoing dialogue between HealthTap and the physician community about the innovations most needed in healthcare today.
Rocking Interactive Health at SXSW

HealthTap led in health innovation at the South by Southwest Interactive conference. Paving the way for a strong health presence at this important gathering, we hosted an interactive health meet-up to connect innovators, as well as a major gathering for the entire SXSW health community.
Our First Expert Answer
The first response to an inquiry on HealthTap came from a New Jersey pediatrician, Dr. Anatoloy Belilovsky, who answered the question: "Should I be concerned about my baby's previous vaccinations?"
Apr 2011
Public beta launch

Following our Beta launch, we opened our virtual doors to the public on Apr 19, 2011, revealing to the world our labor of love. Press included praise in TIME and Forbes, among other national publications.
Our first member
HealthTap's first member outside of our invited Beta group signs up. The immediate adoption of our service by consumers around the country soon leads to users from other countries as well.
May 2011
One thousand doctors!

HealthTap proudly sponsors TEDx Silicon Valley, the most widely viewed TEDx event in the world, with live streaming audiences in 50 countries and more than 330,000 global views. The event, themed "Living by Numbers," focused on how numbers can impact and improve our daily lives and featured speakers like Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor, and Tim O'Reilly.
June 2011
First internship class

Who better to share our first-hand experience in a growing start-up, building a world-class company, than top students from Stanford and beyond? HealthTap's Internship program is designed to provide a memorable educational experience to students interested in health technology and product development.
Jul 2011
We've moved! 101 University

A heated battle for conference room space marked the end of our tenure at our first offices in 575 High Street. We moved on up to an even better location - the former Facebook offices at 101 University Ave, Suite 100, right across from the Cal Train station in the hear of Palo Alto.
Gift horses

Working with and learning from horses was just one of the many benefits of a day celebrating our launch with a retreat in the wine country near Los Gatos. The event also included horseback riding and other equestrian activities.
Sep 2011
Mobile launch

"5,000 doctors, at your fingertips – at home or on the go" became the motto at launch for the new HealthTap Express App. Together with the physician-facing application (HealthTap Express MD), HealthTap's core Q&A functionality was captured in a novel and engaging mobile app.
Oct 2011
50,000 answers!

We reach 50,000 useful, relevant, and current physician-created answers on HealthTap, all available for free. The Medical Experts on HealthTap stay busy improving the quality of online health information one answer, tip, and health guide at a time.
Nov 2011
HealthTap Groups

It's not just for individual physicians anymore! Group practices, hospitals, and other health organizations join HealthTap. Now, these groups can maintain a presence on HealthTap and connect with individual physicians. Five hundred physicians now participate in groups. Read article ›
Dec 2011
Series A

HealthTap is awarded $11.5M in Series A funding, from investors like the Mayfield Fund, Mohr Davidow Ventures, and Eric Schmidt's Innovation Endeavors. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to continue to build the HealthTap that you see today.
Re-treat

The team hits Carmel for the weekend on the second annual company retreat. There, we brainstormed about where HealthTap should go from here and generally how to change the world to help people smile and feel good!
Jan 2012
100,000 agrees!

When doctors feel that an answer from another physician is right on target, they can "agree" with it - immediately boosting the credibility of the answer. The answer with the most agrees is bumped to the top for users to find!
Feb 2012
10,000 doctors!

Our Medical Expert Network reached 10,000 doctors in early 2012 – and it's still growing! This milestone coincided with Valentine's Day, when we launched our "I <3 My Doc" campaign - celebrating physicians everywhere for their hard work and dedication to the care of others.
Mar 2012
Our second SXSW 2012 Interactive Conference

HealthTap hosts the hottest Interactive Health gathering at SXSW, with more than 2,000 people on the wait list. Participants enjoyed party perks like big wheel racing and a photo booth, while simultaneously driving the mobile health movement forward.
Super happy Developer Block Party

HealthTap's award-winning display at the first-ever Developer Block Party (sponsored by the city of Palo Alto) featured in-person doctors answering health questions of the thousands of people who stopped by our "Doctor is In" parklet.
Jun 2012
Fourth internship class

HealthTap's fourth internship class brought together a diverse array of students from Stanford, Berkeley, USC, and UCLA--students who added to the excitement and energy around what HealthTap is doing for the health world.
12,000 doctors!

Our Medical Expert Network continued its remarkable growth, reaching 12,000 U.S.-licensed doctors in Jun 2012. These doctors are actively engaging with HealthTap members and contributing to the world’s leading knowledgebase of online health content.
Jul 2012
Launch of the New HealthTap

The New HealthTap launched as the first-ever mobile health platform, available for everyone (iPhone, iPad, Android and Web). We received positive praise from Washington Post , Bloomberg, Reuters, Forbes and Mashable, as well as TechCrunch and GigaOm among many other well known publications.
Nov 2012
DocScore highlights top doctors

HealthTap’s innovative DocScore is an objective numeric rating (like a FICO score) for doctors, taking into account public information (such as years in practice, medical education, awards, and peer-reviewed publications) as well as interactions on HealthTap (including peer-endorsements and agrees).

HealthTap’s DOConnect is an interactive map showing the referral network of doctors and doctors who treat the same patients at the same time. More than 30 million connections are visible via HealthTap, and each doctor’s connections are visible directly from a doctor’s HealthTap profile page.
HealthTap acquires Avvo Health and grows Directory to 1.2 million doctors

HealthTap’s first acquisition, health Q&A and directory service Avvo Health, expanded HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network to more than 40,000 doctors in 128 specialties, and broadened local coverage across all 50 states. At the same time, HealthTap announced the expansion of its directory coverage to include 1.2 million U.S.-licensed doctors. Read article ›
Disrupting healthcare for the better
HealthTap CEO Ron Gutman was invited to present on CNBC’s “The Disrupters,” a national news series highlighting innovative companies and individuals changing the status quo.
Dec 2012
Health resolutions health journey

HealthTap's new interface makes it easy and intuitive to browse health information, helping users support their health journeys. New features include health resolutions and a body browser, an easy way to explore symptoms and related conditions and treatments, all by clicking on an image of the human body.
Jan 2013
CNN : HealthTap helps you keep resolutions

CNN highlighted HealthTap as one of the very best apps to help you keep your New Year's health resolutions. The video feature aired on CNN during prime time, and was simulcast on 150 stations across the country. Watch video ›
Winter retreat envisions HealthTap’s next generation

HealthTap team members gathered in Northern California for our semi-annual retreat, where we hosted a select group of doctors from diverse practices across the country. They participated in activities that helped us envision the next generation of HealthTap.
Feb 2013

HealthTap brings doctor-created tips straight to your mobile device or computer. To keep healthy living top of mind, users can subscribe to health topics of interest, and receive daily doctor-created tips, suggestions, or bits of advice delivered via email or by SMS push notifications to mobile devices. Users can also discover and browse TipTaps on HealthTap.
Global mobile featuring!
HealthTap, featured globally on Google Play’s Android app market, quickly becomes one of the top 10 most popular health apps worldwide.
Mar 2013
HealthTap personalized!

Mar 2013 also marked the availability of increased personalization to millions on the HealthTap platform. Now when members ask questions, they are prompted with the option to add additional personal information related to the question they are asking. This provides doctors with relevant context and improves the specificity of the answers members receive.
One of the Top Four Out of 40,000 Apps!
In Mar 2013, HealthTap was featured on the TODAY Show as one of the four best health apps from among the 40,000 health applications available for consumers. Watch video ›
Mar 2013
Experts Helping Experts
This month HealthTap unveiled its new initiative called “Curbside Consults.” The program allows a HealthTap physician to use the platform’s network to broadcast a question to other physicians.
Apr 2013
The Full Spectrum release!
The full spectrum of doctor knowledge is made available via HealthTap. Doctor-to-doctor Q&A, concise doctor updates, and full-length doctor posts are released.
Growth!
HealthTap reaches 7.5 million monthly unique visitors, two million app downloads, and more than half a billion doctor answers served.
May 2013
AppRX

In May 2013, HealthTap launched AppRX so our users can get app recommendations from real doctors. With AppRX, we make it fast and easy to find health and wellness apps by creating intuitive, user-friendly categories, and posting doctor recommendations and written reviews. Read article ›
Jul 2013
Health2020 Event

In the summer of 2013, HealthTap had the pleasure of hosting a group of leading engineers, designers, product managers, data experts, and innovators in diverse industries to envision and design the “future of health” in the year 2020. It was a successful day of thought-provoking debate and ideas of how to disrupt the health space.
First doctor conference with Top Doctors

July 2013 marked the first ever HealthTap Doctors’ Conference. Doctors from around the country from multiple specialities, practice sizes, and various stages in their careers offered insights and feedback on the past, present, and future of HealthTap.
Oct 2013
10,000 lives saved

In Oct 2013, HealthTap received the 10,000th user note telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life. By making digital health personal, we're working hard to help many more thousands all over the world live longer, healthier lives. Read article ›
One billion answers served

Since launching our mobile health platform in Jul 2012, we've served more than one billion answers in response to users' health questions, and have created and organized the world's most extensive knowledge base of user questions matched to answers from trusted doctors.
50,000 doctors

We were thrilled when the 50,000th doctor signed up to join our Medical Expert Network! The thank you notes keep pouring in from members who have been helped by our devoted and inspirational doctors. And the doctors are happy too! Word of mouth is spreading in the medical community about HealthTap and how it is helping millions of people around the world feel good!
Nov 2013

HealthTap Labs launches its first app - Talk To Docs. Just speak a question, and the app reads back answers from top doctors. Uses advanced natural language processing, artificial intelligence, and advanced voice recognition technology, Talk To Docs recognizes the health topics you’re interested in, and delivers the most appropriate answers. Read article ›
“Disrupting Healthcare”

HealthTap continued to be featured in national press, with articles in Inc. Magazine (November 2013) and Forbes (November 2013), among many others celebrating the changes that HealthTap is making in the health field.
Feb 2014
HealthTap Documentary

A mini-documentary on HealthTap was released underscoring the importance of the company’s mission to revolutionize the doctor-patient relationship. The film featured patients and doctors who spoke about the deep impact HealthTap is having on their lives. Watch video ›
June 2014
HealthTap launches a smartwatch app
HealthTap redefines healthcare once again and becomes first health app on Google’s Android wear. Now millions around the world get the power of personalized doctor reminders and tips on the go!
Jul 2014
HealthTap moves into 270 University Ave
We move to a new, bigger, better, sunnier office in the heart of downtown Palo Alto!
HealthTap launches HealthTap Prime

Using HealthTap Prime, doctors can make Virtual House Calls via video chats, regular phone calls, or message exchanges. Members of HealthTap+ Prime can request a Virtual House Call at anytime, from anyplace, using any PC or mobile device.
Aug 2014
Doctor house calls are making a come-back with a high-tech twist
The launch of HealthTap Prime received worldwide media coverage, including a feature on Good Morning America!
Two billion!
HealthTap hits two billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
Sep 2014
HealthTap launches on Apple’s Health App

HealthTap launched on Apple’s Health App, providing a seamless way to get your data from device to doctor. Doctors can use the Apple Health App data to provide better recommendations, as well as actionable doctor-created checklists and personalized tips.
Oct 2014
HealthTap launches HealthTap Concierge

With HealthTap Concierge, you can connect with your own doctor from anywhere via video or text consults for a low per-consult fee. No monthly subscription required. Create your own 24/7 Care-Team and get a 2nd, 3rd, or 10th opinion from doctors in more than 100 specialties!
Jan 2015
First AppRx Annual Report

HealthTap releases its first annual report on the top health and medical apps available today. Thousands of doctors on HealthTap independently reviewed tens of thousands of health apps and provided recommendations for some of the ones they deemed the best among the 100,000 health and wellness apps available in the iOS and Android app stores.
Mar 2015
RateRx Launched

HealthTap launches RateRx, the first large-scale resource created by doctors to help consumers understand the effectiveness of drugs and treatments based on doctor’s real-world experience with medications. RateRx empowers more informed discussions between patients and doctors about treatment options.
Apr 2015
20,000th “life saved” thank-you note!
HealthTap received the 20,000th note from a customer telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life.
Three new apps for Apple Watch

HealthTap remains on the forefront of digital health by being offering the first consumer healthcare apps for Apple Watch. DocNow, the first “Affordable Care App,” delivers instant access to doctors on call 24/7 for only $2.99. HealthTap for Apple Watch helps you stay on top of your health with a tap on your wrist. HealthTap for Doctors lets doctors to manage their Virtual Practices right from their Apple Watches.
Three billion answers served
HealthTap crosses three billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
May 2015
HealthTap wins Webby Award
HealthTap wins the 2015 Webby Award—called “The Internet’s highest honor” by the New York Times—in the Mobile Sites & Apps: Health & Fitness Category.
Jun 2015
E-prescriptions now available!
HealthTap announces its collaboration with Quest Diagnostics to enable doctors to order diagnostic testing services for patients.
Aug 2015
World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer
The World Economic Forum selects HealthTap as 2015 Technology Pioneer for its significant global potential to make virtual healthcare accessible to everyone.
Sep 2015
HealthTap Compass gives employees of Flex access to efficient, world-class healthcare

HealthTap launches Compass, a revolutionary new personal healthcare application that will give employees of Flex the ability to “tap in” to intelligent and cost-effective healthcare 24/7. HealthTap Compass serves as a hub for managing all employees’ healthcare needs, from information to prescriptions and even lab test referrals and interpretations, and will replace the traditional “benefits card.”
Oct 2015
HealthTap goes global

HealthTap expands globally, unveiling its new “Health Operating System™ (HOPES)™" for hospitals, clinics, and community-based programs worldwide, starting with the Waikato District Health Board in New Zealand.
250 million people helped!
More than 250 million users have accessed HealthTap doctors’ expertise in the form of answers and curated articles from the world’s largest doctor-created knowledgebase.
Nov 2015
Global Rounds: groundbreaking social learning for doctors

Clinicians around the world can receive continuing medical education (CME) credits for answering patient questions, providing peer review on other doctor answers, and participating in discussions about challenging medical cases in HealthTap Global Rounds, the only digital learning where doctors can collaboratively solve real patient cases with other top doctors.
Jan 2016
HealthTap SOS offers solution for disaster relief

HealthTap now helps victims of natural disasters and terrorist attacks with HealthTap SOS, which it plans to license to municipalities and insurance firms around the world. In case of an emergency such as a hurricane or tsunami, residents of an affected area will be able to text, call, or video chat in real time with one of HealthTap's network of more than 100,000 doctors. The company will aggregate data based on these interactions pushing it back to relief forces, as well as to the government and to global media outlets.
Mar 2016
100,000 Doctors!

More than 100,000 U.S. licensed doctors have joined HealthTap in its virtual care revolution, enabling people everywhere to access quality care from any mobile device or personal computer, and for doctors to deliver care at anytime from anywhere.
4.5 billion answers served!
HealthTap hits four and a half billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
Apr 2016
First-of-its-kind doctor training and certification in virtual care
Doctors can now get official continuing medical education (CME) credits for updating their expertise to include delivering virtual care.
HealthTap chat bot for Facebook's Messenger app

HealthTap was the only health-focused company to be invited by Facebook to create a chat bot for the new Facebook Messenger app. HealthTap’s bot allows users to type a question into Messenger any time and receive free responses from doctors.
May 2016
Partnership with New Zealand’s Waikato District Health Board offers virtual care to rural residents

Based on HealthTap HOPES™, New Zealand’s first “virtual hospital” gives more than one million patients the ability to talk to their doctors via video, audio, or text chat rather than travel to an distant outpatient clinic, improving both access and health outcomes for the Waikato population.
Jul 2016
HealthTap acquires Docphin, brings comprehensive medical education to doctors for free

By acquiring Docphin, a prime educational service for doctors and an emerging go-to resource for new publications in the medical literature, HealthTap can guide doctors to the latest developments and provide them with personalized alerts and updates on topics relevant to their specialties and expertise.
Aug 2016
Group virtual consults with live translators

HealthTap begins offering virtual consults that include multiple participants such as family members, caregivers, specialists, and live translators. This breakthrough service removes language barriers and dramatically expands access to high-quality, immediate care to HealthTap users in 174 countries around the world.

Your Allergies Can Be Treated Today!

You are not alone. 50 million people in the United States suffer from allergy symptoms and its prevalence is increasing, affecting as many as 30 percent of adults and up to 40 percent of children. Allergies can be frustrating and can be an annoyance if not properly treated. At HealthTap, we have licensed qualified doctors who can help make you feel good! We're here 24/7, to help with prescriptions, treatment and advice. What are you waiting for?
Connect with a doctor in under two minutes today and alleviate those allergy frustrations!
Get Help with Your Flu/Cold Symptoms Now!

Achoo! Being sick can make you feel helpless and alone. Sometimes, all you need is a quick doctor chat to get a basic prescription, but you don't want to deal with the hassles of the waiting room. With HealthTap, you can talk to a doctor in under 2 minutes from the comfort of your own bed!
What are you waiting for? Talk to a doctor in less time than it takes to drive there!
Talk to a Doctor Privately Now!
Questions about STDs? HealthTap doctors can offer private confidential advice for your condition. Doctors are standing by 24/7 to offer help, treatment and prescriptions.
Connect with a doctor in minutes in the privacy of your home! Get Confidential Help Now
A Doctor is Standing by to Answer All Your Pregnancy Questions Now!

Pregnancy is a beautiful but complicated process. There are thousands of questions every parent wants to ask but frequently forgets during regular doctor visits. With HealthTap, you can have a doctor on demand anytime, anywhere!
Connect with a doctor in minutes via phone, tablet or computer, 24/7. We're here to help and make sure you and your newborn feel good! Try us today!
Get Treatment for Your Skin Condition Now!

Skin conditions result from a number of factors and can reduce your quality of life. It's important to have a doctor evaluate your condition to ensure it is not something more serious than a minor irritation. At HealthTap, you can connect to a doctor in minutes via chat or video to get peace of mind!
Doctors are standing by 24/7 for advice, treatment or prescriptions. Get help today!

SmartHealth Privacy Statement
Our Privacy Principles, Privacy Constitution & Member Bill of Rights
HealthTap's Privacy Constitution & Member Bill of Rights
Secure Sharing: HealthTap
trans-unit.target: HealthTap

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap you can ask health questions, connect with doctors, get trusted answers and tips, and explore health information without also sharing your personal identity. We call this "secure sharing."

How does it work? On HealthTap, only you know who you are. Your identity is protected. Our community receives the value of learning from your questions and the information you choose to share, and you benefit from the secure sharing of others in our community. You can even personalize your questions without revealing your identity.
is written in easy to read language. We even provided additional suggestions for sharing securely and safeguarding your privacy when participating on HealthTap.
Our company culture respects the values of secure sharing. Our employees receive privacy training, and our
Confidential Consultations: HealthTap Prime and Concierge
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime特邀

trans-unit.source: directly from your computer, tablet, or smartphone. You can ask personal
as appropriate for virtual consults. While interactions on HealthTap Prime
is straightforward and easy to understand. It contains answers to common questions about how our service works and how information provided to us is used and protected.
We take your privacy and security very seriously. Our
trans-unit.target: 我们

trans-unit.source: We also have a Privacy Constitution, consisting of our pledge to you and your rights. This Constitution helps guide our decisions about privacy and security, and secures your rights as a member of our service.

We are here to help you connect with doctors and find helpful health information including useful answers from trusted doctors. We ask only for data that can help us provide this service to you, and to use the data provided to improve your experience on our service.

We will keep the personal information that you provide to us safe and secure. Our data security practices always meet or exceed industry standards. We use technology, policies, and conduct, together with a privacy-centered company culture, to ensure that your data is safe.
Our experience is designed to keep your information anonymous and secure. You can add, remove, update, or request a connection to the personal and health information in your Profile at any time (see

Sharing is a matter of personal choice. Other than registration information, you are not required to share any information with us to use HealthTap. You share what you want, when you want, and sharing is not required to use HealthTap.
You have the right to know what Personally Identifiable Information we collect and how it is used. Our sharing preferences are transparent and our Privacy Statement discloses this information.

I loved my internship at HealthTap. I wanted to experience what a startup was like and do something really transformative in Health. I felt like I wasn't just another intern, and what I did really mattered. Now, I'm so happy to be a part of the full-time team and continue my experience at HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢我在HealthTap的实习。我想体验到一个全新的开始；我希望在健康医疗领域做出一些改变。我觉得我不只是另一个实习生，我所做的真的很重要。现在，我很开心能够成为全职团队的一员，我也将在HealthTap继续工作下去。

trans-unit.source: The best thing about being at HealthTap is that everyone is so passionate and always willing to take time to explain their specific projects. I've learned a lot about the intersection of social media and healthcare and believe that HealthTap is redefining the way people think about doctor- patient interactions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap最好的地方在于：每个人都那么富有激情，而且非常愿意花时间向别人介绍自己独特的项目。我在社交与医疗卫生的交叉领域学习到了不少知识，我相信HealthTap能够重构人们旧式的医患关系理念。

trans-unit.source: As an intern at HealthTap, I have realized that HealthTap's number one goal really is to make the world a better place by making relevant health information accessible to everybody. The people that work at HealthTap are some of the most optimistic and caring people that I have met.
trans-unit.target: 作为HealthTap的实习生，我认为HealthTap的第一宗旨，是通过普及相关健康资讯，把世界变得更加美好。在HealthTap工作的人是我见过的最乐观、最有同情心的人。

trans-unit.source: See our job openings

If you're capable, positive, creative, driven, efficient and a team player, let's connect today. All experienced candidates who are eager to work for a fast-growing company, are ready to hit the ground running and are driven by our common goal of helping improve people's lives are encouraged to apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有能力，积极，有创造力，努力工作，高效率和优秀的团队合作，立即加入我们把。只要你经验丰富，希望能为一个快速成长的公司效力，准备好了不断向前，为了帮助改善人们的生活而不断进取。我们都欢迎你的加入。

HealthTap is here to help you. Our Interactive Health Network and mobile apps connect doctors with patients in smarter ways, provide education to those who seek it and disseminate trusted, vetted, peer-reviewed health information far and wide!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在这里帮助您。我们的健康互动网络和移动应用程序以更智能的方式将医生与患者联系起来，为那些寻求它的人提供教育，并广泛传播可信赖的，仔细审查的，同行评议的健康信息！

trans-unit.source: , we connect you directly with the best health information and the best doctors, from your mobile device or on the web. Here at HealthTap, there’s no waiting room.
trans-unit.target: 我们从您的移动设备或在网络上直接与您的最佳健康信息和最好的医生联系。在HealthTap，没有等候室。

trans-unit.source: , we give you the opportunity and tools to build your online and real-world reputation while making a difference. Attract new patients while also improving the quality of health information online.
trans-unit.target: 我们为您提供机会和工具，以树立您自己的在线和现实声誉，使您有所作为。吸引新患者，同时提高在线健康信息的质量。

trans-unit.source: See what members and doctors are saying
at no cost.
, we want to provide you the tools to give the people you serve access to the most trustworthy health information available online
Connect with me
Doctors have already answered similar questions. See if they've already answered yours.
trans-unit.target: 医生已经回答过相似问题。如果他们已经回答过您，请查看

trans-unit.source: These values reflect who we are, both as individuals and as a company. We discuss these values at every team meeting and measure ourselves against them at every opportunity to do so. They guide who we hire and how we work together. They shape the decisions we make and how we grow.
trans-unit.target: 这些价值观反映了作为个人和公司，我们是谁。在每一次的团队会议中我们都会讨论他们的价值并且一有这样的机会我们就会对照他们以此来审视自己。他们指导我们招募谁，以及我们如何一起工作。它们塑造了我们做出的决定和我们的成长。

trans-unit.source: We're committed to creating a healthier, happier world — one person at a time. To accomplish this, we provide people with reliable, personal health information and trusted answers to real health questions. Our goal is to support doctors and other health experts in helping people make the best possible health decisions.
trans-unit.target: 我们致力于创造一个更健康，更快乐的世界 — 一次一个人为做到这一点，我们向人们提供真实可靠的个人健康信息以及对真正健康问题的可信回答。我们的目标是协助医生和其他健康专家帮助人们做出最好的健康决策。

trans-unit.source: We envision a world where people everywhere can quickly find reliable answers to their health questions, and easily get access to the best experts that will guide them towards a healthier happier life. We envision a future where people can tap into their personal health information, using HealthTap, to manage their health and well-being, feel good and thrive. We are realizing this vision by helping connect people with trustworthy doctors, online and offline, and by improving the quality of care, while saving time and lowering the costs of care.
trans-unit.target: 我们想象中的世界是人们不管在哪里都可以迅速得到有关他们健康问题的可靠回答并且可以轻易地和那些能够指引他们拥有更健康快乐生活的专家取得联系。我们想在不久的将来人们能够通过HealthTap获得他们各自的健康信息来使他们获得健康快乐和茁壮成长。不管是线上或是线下，我们帮助人们与值得信赖的医生取得联系并且在节约时间和金钱的同时提高医护质量，以此来实现这一愿景。

trans-unit.source: Our first responsibility is to do good for the individuals who use HealthTap, especially when making decisions that affect their health and the health of their loved ones. We care deeply about people and are committed to providing information that meets the highest standards of safety and validity.
trans-unit.target: 我们的首要职责是为那些使用HealthTap的人做一些有益的事，特别是当我们需要做一些有关他们自身或他们深爱的人的健康决策时。我们深切地关心人们并且致力于提供一些最有效的符合最高标准的信息。

trans-unit.source: We value and honor the trust of those who use HealthTap. We treat the personal information of individuals with the utmost care and maintain the highest standards of privacy and security.
trans-unit.target: 我们重视和尊重那些信任HealthTap的人。我们将极其谨慎地对待每个人的私人信息并最高要求地保证其安全隐私性。

trans-unit.source: We believe in collaboration and recognize that partnership is integral to realizing our vision. We are committed to being a great partner, and to attracting and retaining the world's best organizations and institutions as collaborators.
trans-unit.target: 我们坚信合作是实现我们美好愿景的重要组成部分。在努力成为一个良好的合作伙伴的同时我们还致力于吸引和留住这些世界上最顶尖的组织机构。

trans-unit.source: We care about our partners' needs and interests and we are committed to their success. We believe that active listening, transparency and trust are central to creating effective, long-term partnerships.
trans-unit.target: 我们关心我们合作伙伴的需求和爱好，并且会尽自己最大努力帮助他们取得成功。我们坚信积极的倾听、透明的管理制度和彼此的信任是创造长期有效合作最重要的部分。

trans-unit.source: We are committed to creating and maintaining a place where our employees love to work. We are responsible for ensuring that our employees are treated with care and respect, and that they are challenged to achieve their potential.
trans-unit.target: 我们致力于创造一个能使我们员工热爱工作的环境和场所。我们的职责是保证我们的员工能够得到关心和尊重并且使他们的潜力得到最大发挥。

trans-unit.source: We believe that work can be play, and that working hard toward a worthy goal is one of the most fulfilling ways to spend our time. We believe that happy, fulfilled employees who share a commitment to changing the world will bring forth the creativity and passion needed to fulfill our vision.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信工作可以作为一种兴趣的玩乐，朝着一个有价值的目标并且不断地努力工作是十分有意义的。我们相信一个献身于改变世界的乐观员工会为实现我们的愿景注入新鲜的血液及激情。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that being kind is central to living a healthy life, and having a healthy company. However we may differ in our ideas, approaches and perspectives, caring for one another unites us.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信宽容善良是让我们过上健康生活和拥有健康伴侣的重要品质。无论我们的想法，方式和观点有多少不同，但关爱他人是我们共同的初衷。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that being open and transparent facilitates collaboration and teamwork and creates a constructive environment in which the best ideas flourish, regardless of their origins. We believe that openness and transparency, together with integrity and honesty, form the foundation of trust required for our success.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信公开透明将有助于提高团队合作并且营造一个良好的氛围：大家共同碰撞智慧的火花，不论我们来自哪里，有怎样的背景。我们相信开放透明和正直廉洁构成了我们成功所需要的信任。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that as a team we can achieve far more than as a group of individuals, and that the best ideas are developed through a collaborative process. We enjoy interacting with one another and believe that our connection is central to our strength.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信一个团队所能达到的高度远远超过个人并且我们相信最好的创意一定是团队共同努力的结果。我们享受彼此互动的过程并且坚信着彼此的联系是使我们优势更明显的关键。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that something worth doing is worth doing right. We hold ourselves to the highest standards and consistently aim to excel. We like to win, and we love to learn. We enjoy challenging ourselves and strive for personal mastery.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信值得做的事情就是值得去做。。我们坚持最高标准并始终追求卓越。我们喜欢胜利，我们热爱学习。我们喜欢挑战自己并努力为个人掌握。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that the world is changed by passionate people who channel positive energy toward a vision they believe in. Positive energy fuels our progress and brings joy to our journey by helping us endure, see beyond, and overcome challenges and difficulties.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信是那些将正能量转化为动力去实现愿景的充满激情的人们在改变这个世界。正能量加快我们前进的步伐，使我们变得包容，在我们前进的路上为我们带来快乐，帮助我们克服困难险阻。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that 'work' can feel like play, and strive to find and bring into each day playfulness, fun and joy.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信工作可以被看做是一种娱乐，努力寻找并带入每一天的快乐之中。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that childlike wonder fuels creativity, and we are driven by a desire to create the new. We look for new ways of acting, and are not anchored to how things have been done in the past. We question assumptions and the status quo, and ask tough questions that are not easily answered.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信孩子般的好奇能够促使创造力的出现并且我们由需求驱动去寻找创新新的事物。我们不局限于旧的完成方式，我们寻找新的方式去创造。我们不断质疑假设和现状并且不断提出一些很难被回答的问题。

trans-unit.source: . We are driven by changing the world and making a meaningful difference in the lives of millions of people everywhere. In order to achieve our goals, we are focused on driving short term measurable milestones that add up to long term real impact.
trans-unit.target: .改变这个世界和让这个世界上数以百万计的人生活方式发生质的改变是我们最大的动力。为了完成我们的目标，我们首先从一个个小的目标开始累计完成。

trans-unit.source: . We are on a mission to create a healthier world, and we recognize that this starts at home. We pledge to take care of our own health and well-being, and to help others do the same. In large and small ways, we strive to help everyone with whom we interact improve their health and well-being.
trans-unit.target: .我们的使命是创造一个更健康的世界，并且我们认识到这个改变从家里开始。我们承诺照顾好自己的健康和幸福，同样帮助别人实现这样的目标。在大大小小的方面，我们都努力帮助那些与我们保持联系的人们保持提高他们的健康和幸福。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that simple is better, and strive to reduce complexity to its essence. We believe that with good work, any idea can be described on a napkin, and that the effort required to simplify something to its essence is worthwhile.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信简单即更好，并努力简化复杂的本质。我们相信通过努力任何想法都可以被描述为是一张纸巾而那些简化东西的努力对它的本质来说都是很重要的。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that facts and data in context lead to better, truly personalized decisions and improved outcomes. Whenever possible, we will use facts, data, and information as the language of our internal discussions and as the basis for our decisions. When a strong opinion and fact are in opposition, burden of proof will rest on the opinion.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信联系实际情况的事实和数据有助于形成更完善真实的个性化决策和产生更好的效果。一旦可以，我们就会用事实、数据和一些信息作为我们内部讨论的语音和决定基础。当事实与意见不符时，我们将进一步检验核实，改善决策。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that the feeling of being on a mission will help us achieve a greater purpose with our work. As with any adventure, we will take risks and embrace failures, but always learn from our mistakes to make us better. The path to success has its ups and downs and requires a fearless spirit. But most importantly, we recognize that the journey is as rewarding as the destination.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信使命感将有助于我们的工作达到更高的目标。当有任何机遇挑战时，我们都会迎接挑战并且接受失败，但我们总会从失误中不断学习使自己变得更加优秀。成功的道路有它的起伏，但我们有无所畏惧的精神。但最重要的是，我们认识到过程和结果一样让人受益。

trans-unit.source: Very soon, up to 40 million Americans will gain access to healthcare under the Affordable Care Act, but the number of doctors remains the same. We can help!
trans-unit.target: 很快，通过平价医疗法案高达四千万的美国人得到了医疗保障，但是医生的数量维持不变。我们可以帮助！

trans-unit.source: "It’s good to know that our little efforts on HealthTap could be a lifesaver for someone else. Makes me want to do even more!”
trans-unit.target: 知道我们在HealthTap上一些微薄之力能够救助他人是一件很幸福的事情。让我想做更多！"

trans-unit.source: "I love answering questions and agreeing with other doctors' answers. I feel like I can learn from their answers as well.”
trans-unit.target: “我喜欢回答问题和同意其他医生的解答。我觉得我也可以从他们的答案中学习。

trans-unit.source: "I have found HealthTap a surprisingly intimate and collegial community. I'm delighted to have formed friendships with some colleagues both across the country and locally.”
trans-unit.target: “我发现HealthTap是一个令人惊讶的亲密和合作的社区。我很开心能与遍布各地的同事建立起不错的友谊。

trans-unit.source: Not a doctor? Help here ›
trans-unit.target: 不是一位医生吗?这里需要帮助 ›

trans-unit.source: Great! Now tell your colleagues who invited them
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！现在告诉您的同事是谁邀请的他们

money

"Every time I have a question, I send it and get a response in no time. It doesn’t matter what my question is about or when I ask, someone always answers.”
trans-unit.target: “每次我有一个问题，我发送它并很快得到一个答复。我是什么时候提出的问题或者我的问题是有关什么的并不重要，总有人会回答：

trans-unit.source: "Thanks HealthTap and all your wonderful doctors! If it weren’t for your kindness, I probably would not be here today thanking you!”
trans-unit.target: “感谢HealthTap和你所有伟大的医生！如果不是你的仁慈，我可能今天不会在这里感谢你！

trans-unit.source: "I couldn’t believe the attention these physicians were giving my issues; such real-time interactive insight at my fingertips…. Thanks to you and may God bless the hands that heal.”
trans-unit.target: “我不敢相信这些内科医生对我问题的重视；像这样十分真实的互动随手可得……感谢你，愿上帝保佑那治病救人的手。

trans-unit.source: Are you a doctor? Help here ›
trans-unit.target: 您是一位医生吗？这里需要帮助 ›

trans-unit.source: sound familiar? How about paying a costly service for ratings?
Interviewing doctors, creating surveys, running data
Now you can get top doctor lists for free from HealthTap. Rankings are comprehensive, reliable and customizable. You get the lists you want, when you want them.
trans-unit.target: 现在您可以从HealthTap免费获得知名医生名单排名是全面，可靠和可定制。当您需要他们时，您可以得到您想要的名单。

trans-unit.source: Lists can be used in connection with everything from special issues dedicated to best doctors to one-off articles. Sign up for access today!
trans-unit.target: 列表可以用来连接从知名医生到一次性物品等各种特殊需要。立即注册访问！

trans-unit.source: Modern medicine and healthcare too often emphasize “health” over “care,” focusing more on treatments and medications than on the human aspect of care. As patients, we also have very few opportunities to show our deep appreciation and gratitude for the doctors who give us hope and help us at some of our most challenging of times.
trans-unit.target: 现代医疗注重于强调”健康”超过”关怀”，更注重于治疗和药物而不是人自身方面的关怀。作为一个患者来说，我们很少有机会向在我们面临挑战时帮助我们的医生来表达我们内心的感激。

trans-unit.source: “Thanks doc!” is multimedia art installation taking viewers on a symbolic journey of care and gratitude, and highlighting the impact of caring for others by sharing knowledge and showing compassion. The piece uses actual words of thanks that patients have shared with doctors, demonstrating the often unspoken appreciation we feel for the doctors who help us overcome adversity, and who tend to us when we need it most.
trans-unit.target: “谢谢您，医生！”的多媒体艺术让观看者通过这些文字符号来表达关怀和感激，并且强调通过分享知识和表现同情对关爱他人的重要影响。患者通过使用特定的语言文字与医生分享他们内心的感激，证明我们虽然不常用语言来表达但我们还是十分感谢他们帮助我们度过苦难以及在最需要他们的时候无条件靠近陪伴。

trans-unit.source: These expressions of deep, true thanks were posted by real patients on HealthTap’s iPhone, Android, and iPad apps, and online on healthtap.com. The doctors in the exhibit are part of HealthTap’s rapidly growing Medical Expert Network.
trans-unit.target: 患者通过iPhone, Android, and iPad中下载的HealthTap的软件或者直接登入HealthTap的网站来留言表示他们内心深处最真实的感激。这些被展出的医生是HealthTap医学专家网络中快速发展的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The series of 18 panels (above) combines images of helpful doctors with real patient thank you notes. The installation was first displayed at the Stanford MedicineX Conference at the Stanford School of Medicine on September 29–30, 2012.
trans-unit.target: 这一系列是获得患者感谢卡的有帮助的医生图片的18个展板。2012年9月29日至30日这个装置第一次在斯坦福大学的医学会议中展出。

trans-unit.source: Patients, share your thanks for a doctor who's made a difference in your life. Doctors, share notes of appreciation from your patients.
trans-unit.target: 患者，分享您的感谢与使您的生活有所不同的医生。医生，分享您的患者的感谢信。

trans-unit.source: Submit your thanks today

This simple act goes a long way toward improving your mood and the mood of those around you, reducing stress and spreading happiness in a fantastic and contagious way. This is why we’ve made sure to incorporate this positive energy into what we build for you.
trans-unit.target: 这一个微小的动作将会愉悦您以及您周围人的心情，减轻压力并且以一个极棒的方式散播这份愉悦。这就是为什么我们十分确定地要将这份正能量融合进我们现在正在为您做的。

trans-unit.source: by Ron Gutman brings together even more unique findings from his deep research of the science and history of smiling, with anecdotes from his outreach to social media and his travels around the world. The book reveals the astonishing benefits that smiling can produce for you and for others, and includes tips for how to bring more smiles into your life and to the lives of others.
trans-unit.target: Ron Gutman将他对微笑地科学历史的深入研究的结果和延伸的社会媒体和他环游世界的旅行中的奇闻异事联接在一起。这本书讲述了微笑可以为您和别人产生的令人震惊的优势并且也包含了怎么为自己和他人的生活带来更多的微笑的秘诀。

trans-unit.source: Smile: The Astonishing Powers of a Simple Act
trans-unit.target: 微笑：一个简单行为的惊人力量

trans-unit.source: In 2011, our Founder & CEO, Ron Gutman gave a TED Talk on the hidden power of smiling. Within weeks of becoming available online, it became one of the most "liked” TED talks of all time.
Ron is HealthTap's Founder and CEO. He is responsible for the company's innovation, vision and product.
trans-unit.target: Ron是HealthTap的创始人和CEO。他负责公司的创新，愿景和产品。

trans-unit.source: Ron is also an avid public speaker and writer, frequently presenting at health and technology conferences (such as TED, SXSW and Health 2.0) and contributing pieces about technology, health and smiling in leading publications (such as Forbes, the Huffington Post, and TEDBooks). Additionally, he serves as the Curator of TEDx Silicon Valley.
trans-unit.target: Ron同时也是一个热心的公众演说家和作家，常常出现在有关健康和技术的会议中（比如TED, SXSW and Health 2.0）并且为有关技术、健康和领先的核心刊物（比如Forbes, the Huffington Post, and TEDBooks）上的发表做贡献。此外，他还是TEDx硅谷的管理者。

trans-unit.source: As a graduate student at Stanford University, Ron organized and led a multidisciplinary group of faculty and graduate students conducting research in personalized health and in the design of ways to help people live healthier, happier lives. The group's work resulted in the implementation of one of the most acclaimed and engaging employee health and well-being programs in the nation, BeWell@Stanford.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个从斯坦福大学毕业的学生而言，Ron组织领导了一个由多个学院和毕业学生组成的多学科交融的团队来研究调查个人的健康和涉及不同的方式使人们生活更加健康快乐。这个团队的工作使得这个最让人欢呼雀跃、最具有魅力的关于员工健康福祉的项目之一在这个国家展开。

trans-unit.source: In addition to his passion for health and well-being, Ron is passionate about smiling. After discovering the transformative potential of smiling in his own life, he began to research the benefits of smiling for the self, others, and changing social situations for the better. His research and learnings on the Hidden Powers of Smiling are chronicled in a TED Talk, an article on Forbes.com and a TED book .
trans-unit.target: 除了对健康和幸福的热情，Ron还热衷于微笑。在他在自己的生活中发现微笑具有改革变化的能力后，他开始研究调查微笑对自身和他人的优势并且想要使社会条件变得更好。他对于微笑隐藏能力的研究和学习被TED大会、Forbes的文章和TED的书所记载。

Ron is HealthTap's Founder and CEO. He's responsible for the company's innovation, vision, and product. Prior to founding HealthTap, Ron was the founder and CEO of a leading online consumer health 2.0 company that developed the world's largest community of independent health writers and became one of the largest health sites on the Internet, serving more than 100 million users (acquired in early 2009).
trans-unit.target: Ron是HealthTap的创始人和CEO。他负责公司的创新，愿景和产品。在创立HealthTap之前，Ron是一个领先的网络公司的创始人和总裁。这个网络公司不仅培养了世界上最大的有关健康方面的独立作家并且从2009年开始到现在服务了至少十亿人成为了网络最大的健康网站之一。

trans-unit.source: Geoff is HealthTap's co-founder and Chief Medical Information Officer. He is responsible for the architecture of HealthTap's Medical Knowledge Base. Prior to joining HealthTap, Geoff served as the Chief Medical Officer and the Executive Vice President of Product Development at ePocrates, as the Chief Medical Officer of Wellsphere, and created the first consumer health site at Healtheon (WebMD). Additionally, Geoff has served as the Chief of Medical Informatics in Emergency Medicine for Harvard University teaching hospital Beth Israel, and on the clinical faculty in Emergency Medicine at Stanford University and UCSD.
trans-unit.target: Geoff是HealthTap的联合创始人和首席医务信息官。他负责建立HealthTap的医学知识库。再加入HealthTap之前，Geoff是ePocrates的首席医务官和副总裁、Wellsphere的总裁。并且他在Healtheon创造了第一个有关顾客健康的网站。此外，Geoff在哈佛附属医院以色列医院的急症医学科担任首席药物信息官，在斯坦福大学和加利福尼亚大学圣迭戈分校的急症医学科担任临床教员。

trans-unit.source: Sean is HealthTap’s Head of Product. He is responsible for taking product ideas and feedback from concept to market, and into the hands of millions of patients and doctors around the world. Sean is an engineer, designer, and serial technology entrepreneur. Prior to HealthTap, Sean was the co-founder of PayoutHub, a social game-monetization platform (acquired in 2009), and the co-founder and COO of GXStudios (GoCrossCampus and PickTeams), a venture-backed pioneer of online team-based casual games. Sean has also worked with leading health and technology firms. Sean also co-founded and led the Yale Entrepreneurial Institute, the University’s official incubator and fellowship program for entrepreneurs. Sean has a technical background in UIUX development and design, and holds inventions in the fields of oral drug delivery, urinary incontinence, genetic testing, and polymer nanocomposites.
trans-unit.target: Sean是HealthTap的产品总监。他负责将产品理念和反馈从概念推向市场，并被全球数百万患者和医生掌握。Sean是一位工程师，设计师和一系列技术的企业家。在加入HealthTap之前，Sean是一个叫PayoutHub有关游戏钱币化平台的组织（收购于2009年）的共同创立人，也是一个叫GXStudios(GoCrossCampus and PickTeams)有关资金支持在线团队休闲游戏的组织的共同创立人、首席运营官。Sean还与领先的卫生和技术公司合作。Sean也是耶鲁大学创业协会的共同创立人和引领者，该协会在这个学校为企业家们提供机会和奖学金计划。Sean拥有UIUX的研发技术背景，并且在口服药、尿失禁、基因检测和聚合物纳米复合材料领域中拥有一些发明。

trans-unit.source: Sean holds an M.B.A. from Stanford Graduate School of Business and a B.S. (with Distinction) in Biomedical Engineering from Yale University.
trans-unit.target: Sean荣获斯坦福大学商学院的M.B.A.和B.S.（荣誉毕业生）在耶鲁大学的生物医学工程。

trans-unit.source: Sastry is HealthTap's co-founder and CTO. He is responsible for HealthTap's innovative technology platform. Prior to joining HealthTap, Sastry served as Chief Technology Officer and Executive Vice President at Wellsphere, the CTO of HealthCentral, and the former Director of Software Development at Microvision. Sastry has lead technology teams to build market-leading products and tools, including ERwin, the world's most popular data modeling software.
trans-unit.target: Ron是HealthTap的联合创始人和CTO。他负责HealthTap技术平台的创新。在加入HealthTap之前，Sastry是Wellsphere的首席技术官和副总裁，HealthCentral的首席技术官，也是Microvision的前软件开发主管。Sastry带领她的团队开发了在市场中处于领先地位的产品和工具，包括世界上最有名的数据建模软件——Erwin。

trans-unit.source: Michael is HealthTap's Chief Privacy Officer, General Counsel, and Business Development Director. He is responsible for HealthTap's privacy and legal policies, the company’s legal affairs, and for HealthTap’s business development. For over a dozen years, Michael has provided legal counsel and services to innovative technology companies, from early-stage startups to Fortune 100 companies. Prior to joining HealthTap, Michael served as an attorney with national law firms in Silicon Valley, as general counsel to high technology companies, and as pro-bono counsel to Singularity University. Additionally, Michael has served as a Judge Pro Tem in Santa Clara County, and as a judicial clerk in the Washington D.C. Court of Appeals. At Yale Law School, Michael was an editor of the
trans-unit.target: Michael是HealthTap的首席隐私保密官、总顾问、业务发展总监。他负责HealthTap的隐私和法律政策、公司的法律事务以及公司的商业发展。十多年了，Michael提供法律顾问和服务来创新驱动科技公司，这些公司包括刚刚创业的公司到一百强公司。在加入HealthTap之前，Michael是硅谷国家事务律师所的律师，是高科技公司的总顾问，也是奇点大学公益法律顾问。除此之外，Michael曾在在圣克拉拉县担任当地的法官一职，也曾在华盛顿上诉法院担任司法书记。在耶鲁法学院，Michael是的编辑

trans-unit.source: Michael holds A.B. (honors) and M.A. degrees from Stanford University, and a J.D. from the Yale Law School.
trans-unit.target: Michael荣获A.B.（荣誉）斯坦福大学的硕士学位、耶鲁大学法学院的法学博士。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Jeff Livingston is HealthTap's Medical Director. He is a national thought leader and speaker on doctor adoption of social media. He has been a doctor at MacArthur OB/GYN since 2003 in Irving, Texas. He previously served as Chairman of the Obstetrics and Gynecology Department at Baylor Medical Center of Irving. Several national publications, including USA Today, Wired magazine, Computerworld.com and Physicians Practice have featured his combined use of Facebook, Twitter and a secure patient portal to effectively communicate with patients and to better meet their everyday healthcare needs.
trans-unit.target: Dr. Jeff Livingston是HealthTap的医疗主管。他是一个国家思想领袖和关于医生采用社交媒体倡议者。他2003年曾在德克萨斯州欧文市担任MacArthur OB / GYN的医生。他先前是欧文贝勒医学中心妇产科的主席。一些国家刊物，包括《今日美国》、《连线》杂志、《计算机世界》和《医生实践》精选整合了Facebook, Twitter和病人安全的门户来有效的与病人沟通交流和应和他们每天的健康需求。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Livingston serves on the Medical Advisory Board for HealthTap and he is the Chief Medical officer for Healthcare Transformation Solutions. He is on Twitter as @macobgyn and is an active doctor blogger.
trans-unit.target: Dr. Livingston在HealthTap的顾问委员会就职并且是医疗转换解决方案的首席医务官。他Twitter为@macobgyn，是一位活跃的医生博主。

trans-unit.source: We're hiring! Visit our
trans-unit.target: 我们正在招募。访问我们

trans-unit.source: Enhance your practice, hospital or health website with a free, customized HealthTap widget. In less than five minutes, you can be up-and-running with HealthTap functionality that allows your visitors to ask health questions, learn about top doctors, or view health tips on the topic of your choice right from your site!
trans-unit.target: 增加您通过医院或者网上的免费练习来自定义HealthTap的小物。在五分钟之内，您可以通过HealthTap的功能来让您问一些有关健康问题，了解最顶尖的医生和直接在您的网站上浏览一些有关健康的秘诀使自己变得生龙活虎。

trans-unit.source: Have a website or app that could benefit from the power of HealthTap? Tap into HealthTap's powerful content creation engine that provides interactive, real-time access to the most trusted medical expertise in the world.
trans-unit.target: 有一个网站或应用程序，可以从HealthTap的力量获得福利？利用HealthTap强大的引擎内容来提供互动并实时访问到世界上最值得心灵的医学专家。

trans-unit.source: We are joining forces with the world's best partners and third-party developers. If you have an idea on how HealthTap's service can complement your existing website or application,
trans-unit.target: 我们正与世界上最好的合作伙伴和第三方开发商合作。如果您对怎样能使HealthTap的服务让您想更久地待在这个网站或程序有任何的补充或想法

trans-unit.source: before they call you after hours
from your website
by giving patients the opportunity to use HealthTap
with your colleagues from medical school and residency. Learn how top colleagues in your area of practice are answering medical questions.
trans-unit.target: 从医学院与您的同事。了解您实践领域的知名同事如何回答医疗问题。

trans-unit.source: for your compassion, medical expertise and answers. Compete locally, statewide, nationally and within specialized “Known for” categories.
trans-unit.target: 为您的仁慈，医疗专长和答案。在本地、本州、国家以及专门以此文明的类别中竞争。

trans-unit.source: Show patients and referring doctors, in your community and around the world, what you are known for. Create visibility. Manage your online reputation.
trans-unit.target: 在您的社区和这个世界展示您了解到的有关的患者和一些顾问医生。创建可见性。管理您的线上声誉。

trans-unit.source: Download your mobile app. Or we'll make you your own.
trans-unit.target: 下载您的移动应用程序。或者我们会让您成为您自己的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a platform for me to participate in patient education. Indeed, it's also a place where doctors can learn pearls from each other, and that's very valuable.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是我参与患者教育的平台。确实，在这里医生们也可以从互相身上学习到一些很珍贵的东西。

trans-unit.source: Useful health tips + beautiful images, delivered daily. Choose from 100 helpful topics.
trans-unit.target: 有帮助的健康小贴士+美丽的图像，每日推送。从100个有帮助的主题中选择

trans-unit.source: Extend Your Reach
Virtualize Your Practice
Connect With Patients
Build Your Reputation
Customize your patient app

Follow a doctor to receive their HealthTap answers, interactions and updates on your feed. You can also start a private conversation by sending the doctor a message or requesting an in-person appointment.
trans-unit.target: 跟随一个医生来获得他们的HealthTap回答，相互交流并且更新您的新闻订阅。您也可以通过给您的医生发一个信息来开始一个私人的对话或者请求一个面对面的交流机会。

trans-unit.source: Did you find a particular doctor's answer helpful? Show them your appreciation with just one click by thanking them. You'll also have the opportunity to provide a personalized thank you note.
trans-unit.target: 您找到一个特别的医生有帮助的答案吗？向他们表示感谢，只需点击一下感谢他们。您还将有机会提供个性化的感谢信。

trans-unit.source: Topic pages provide a general overview of a health topic, and reflect the collective wisdom of HealthTap Medical Experts. In addition to a description, you'll find links to relevant content (including Answers, Tips, and Health Guides) and to related Topics. Current Top Doctors for each Topic are featured on this page. You can add content to Health Guides, and even share content, directly from a Topic page.
trans-unit.target: 主题页面提供关于健康主题的总体概述，并反映HealthTap医学专家的集体智慧。除了描述之外，您还可以找到相关内容（包括答复，提示和健康指南）以及相关主题的链接。本页面显示每个主题的当前热门医生。您可以直接从主题页面添加内容到健康指南，甚至共享内容。

trans-unit.source: If you can improve a description on HealthTap simply select "Edit description" and make your changes. These will take effect immediately, and you'll be identified as the most recent editor to the Topic description.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想改进HealthTap上的描述，只需选择“编辑描述”并进行更改。这些将立即生效，您将被标识为主题描述的最新编辑人。

trans-unit.source: Let the doctor know what your requested visit concerns. You can even attach an image if you’d like.
trans-unit.target: 告诉医生您要求访问的关注。如果您愿意您也可以附上一幅图片

trans-unit.source: All the responses to questions that have been answered appear on this page, where you can Thank experts, send Thank You Notes, and even Share the Answers that you appreciate. You can also add to your Health Activity and see Top Doctors on Related Topics.
trans-unit.target: 所有的对于这个问题的回答将会出现在这一页中，在这里您可以感谢专家，发送感谢信甚至可以分享您觉得有用的回答。您也可以添加到您的健康活动，并看到相关主题的知名医生。

trans-unit.source: All of the answers by Medical Experts appear below the question. Quickly browse the summary responses then read the detailed answers. The most relevant, highly ranked responses appear first.
trans-unit.target: 医学专家的所有答案都出现在这个问题下面。快速浏览回复摘要，然后阅读详细的答案。首先出现最相关的和排名最高的。

trans-unit.source: Thank Medical Experts for the Answers that you appreciate. Thanking earns you points, and shows gratitude for the great health information provided.
trans-unit.target: 感谢医疗专家您欣赏的答案。感谢获得了您的观点并且对得到的健康信息表示感谢。

trans-unit.source: After you Thank an Expert, you'll have an opportunity to add a Thank You Note. Thank You Notes show added appreciation, and experts can post these notes to their Virtual Practices. (Please do not include any questions or information in these notes, and only send what you agree can be publicly shared).
trans-unit.target: 在您感谢专家后，您将获得添加一封感谢信的机会。感谢信表达了感激并且专家们可以通过虚拟手法将这些信展示出来。（请不要再这封信中出现任何个人问题或信息，请只写您同意能够被公开发表分享的）

trans-unit.source: Questions & Answers

HealthTap’s now gives you instant access to the latest peer-reviewed medical research, together with insights about it and comments on it from the medical experts on HealthTap. Have a question about a published study? We’ve got you covered – you can send a public question to our network, or even ask the doctor of your choice a question about the research via a Private Conversation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap现在使您能够及时访问到最新医学研究的同行评议和关于它的简介以及HealthTap医学专家对此的评论。对已发表的研究有一个问题？我们将全方面的为您提供帮助——您可以向我们的网络发送公开的问题，您甚至可以在HealthTap通过私人对话直接问您选择的医生有关调查研究的问题。

trans-unit.source: Want clarification? Ask a question about the article to our community of experts, or even enter into a Private Conversation about it with the doctor you choose.
trans-unit.target: 想要解释？您可以向我们的专家团队咨询一些有关这篇文章的问题，您也可以选择一个医生进行单独的会话。

trans-unit.source: Want to know what other doctors think of the research? Read the comments posted by medical experts, and learn what they have to say.
trans-unit.target: 想知道什么其他医生认为可以研究？读医学专家发表的评论，并理解他们说了什么。

trans-unit.source: Want to learn more? Quickly find other related publications on HealthTap, including similar research or articles by the same authors.
trans-unit.target: 想了解更多吗？迅速在HealthTap上找到其他相关出版物，包括同一作者类似的研究或文章。

trans-unit.source: Search & Ask
Points are a sign of your engagement on HealthTap and your engagement with your personal health. View your points directly from your home page. The higher your points, the more stars you'll have.
trans-unit.target: 积分是您参与HealthTap以及个人健康的标志直接从您的首页查看您的积分。您的分数越高，您会拥有更多的星星。

trans-unit.source: Add items to your Health History to personalize the information, doctors, and people HealthTap presents to you. Save items to your Health History to create a personal health record and to better inform you and your doctor, and to improve your Dr. Visit Prep Sheets.
trans-unit.target: 向您的健康历史记录中添加内容，使HealthTap向您提供的信息，医生和人员个人化。在您的健康历史记录中保存内容以创建个人健康记录，更好地通知您和您的医生，并完善您的医生预备访问表。

trans-unit.source: Thank doctors for useful answers they post. Showing your appreciation encourages more answers, which helps everyone.
trans-unit.target: 感谢医生他们发布的有帮助的答案。给更多解答您的赞赏鼓励，这对大家是有帮助的。

trans-unit.source: Select the doctor you’d like to ask a personal question to and start your private conversation. In this interaction, your real name, Health Profile and Health Activity will be shown to the doctor.
trans-unit.target: 选择您想要提出个人问题的医生，并开始私人谈话。在交谈中，医生将会看到您的真实姓名，健康档案和健康活动。

trans-unit.source: Once you submit your question, the doctor will be notified. When the doctor responds, you’ll be notified. This response will be visible only to you inside your Timeline. You or the doctor can attach images to the question. Private questions and answers are available for a small fee.
trans-unit.target: 当您提交了您的问题后，医生会得到通知。当医生有反应后，您会得到通知。此反应在您的时间轴中只对您显示。您或医生可以为问题附上图像。私人问题和答案会收取少量费用。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to follow up with an additional question for this doctor, you can do so. Follow up messages to a private conversation are available at half price.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想跟进这个医生的其他问题，您可以这样做。后续私人会话的消息可以半价获得。

trans-unit.source: After you enter a search, similar questions and related information (including Answers, Tips, Health Guides, Topics, Medical Experts and members) are shown. If your question is new and hasn't been answered, you can submit it to our thousands of Medical Experts.
trans-unit.target: 在您输入搜索后，将会看到类似的问题和相关信息（包括答复，提示，健康指南，主题，医疗专家和会员）如果您的问题是新的还没有得到回答，您可以把问题提交给我们的数以千计的医疗专家。

trans-unit.source: Enter your health question here (up to 150 characters in length). You can also search for health information and existing answers on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 在此输入您的健康问题（最多150个字符）。您还可以在HealthTap上搜索健康信息和现有答案。

trans-unit.source: Asking a question for someone else? Want to share the answer? Enter their email addresses here and we’ll notify them when the question is answered.
trans-unit.target: 为其他人咨询一个问题想分享这个答案吗？在这里输入他们的电子邮件地址，我们将会在问题得到回答时通知他们.

trans-unit.source: We've kept is simple, with one search box. Enter what you're looking for and use the tabs to limit results to questions, doctors, topics, or groups.
trans-unit.target: 我们保持简单，只有一个搜索框。输入您想要查找的内容，然后使用标签将检索结果限制在问题，医生，主题或群组。

trans-unit.source: through your Virtual Practice.
answering patient questions
by doing what you do best
Download HealthTap Express for Medical Experts on iPhone, Android, and iPad
for your compassion and medical expertise as expressed your answers. Win annual regional or national awards in each specialty and other special awards throughout the year.
trans-unit.target: 为您的仁慈和医疗专长表达您的答案。全能在各专业获得年度地区或国际奖项以及其他特殊奖励。

trans-unit.source: Your Virtual Practice page is how users see you on HealthTap. It is the place where all of the expert content you create, Agree with, and curate appear. Your professional contact information and bio also appear here. This is the place to send existing and prospective patients to demonstrate your expertise.
trans-unit.target: 您的虚拟实践页面是用户如何在HealthTap上看到您。这是您创建，同意和策展的所有专家内容出现的地方。您的专业联系信息和个人资料也出现在这里。这里是传送现有的和可能的患者以展示您的专业知识的地方

trans-unit.source: Your statistics are a reflection of your engagement on HealthTap. Raising your stats raises your rank among your peers and enhances your Trust Score, which helps get you featured to new and existing patients.
trans-unit.target: 您的统计数字反映了您在HealthTap的参与程度。完善您的统计数据有利于提升您在同行中的排名，并提高您的信任分数，这有助于您在新的和现有的患者中彰显特色。

trans-unit.source: Members can easily access relevant information that you share under five tabs: Answers, Tips & Health Guides (the content you've created), Feed (your HealthTap activity and the activity of your network), Network (your Network), About (your professional contact information and your accomplishments), and Award Wall (the Awards and Thanks you've received).

Your Virtual Practice is the place where you can create content and interact with others on HealthTap. From here you can answer questions and see your latest activity. You can also Agree with content created by other experts and refer questions to them, as well as see recently active colleagues, and invite colleagues to join you on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您的虚拟操作指的是您可以在HeathTap上创建内容并与其他人交流的地方。从这里，您可以回答问题，并查看您的最新活动。您也可以赞同其他专家所创建的内容并向他们提出问题，并看到最近活跃的同事，然后邀请他们在HealthTap加入您。

trans-unit.source: Your points and level indicate how active and engaged you are on HealthTap. Your activity level determines your visibility and reputation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您的等级和积分表示您在HealthTap上的积极性和参与度您的活动级别决定了您在HealthTap上的可见性和声誉

trans-unit.source: Build your Virtual Practice while creating professional consensus around the best content on HealthTap. Agreeing with answers adds them to your Virtual Practice and helps them become more visible to members and other experts.
trans-unit.target: 在与HealthTap最好的内容创造专业共识时创立您自己的虚拟操作。赞同答复时会把答复添加到您的虚拟操作中，并且有助于答复在面向会员和其他专家时更直观。

trans-unit.source: Message & Recommend
Promote Your Research
Thanks & Agrees

HealthTap recognizes that most doctors have several areas of practice that they are “known for” based on past training or cumulative clinical experience. Therefore we enable you to attract patients to your practice based on up to 5 Known for topics that can be changed at any time. You can also vote your colleagues up in specific categories to improve their standings.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap认可大多数医生因一些领域的操作而闻名是基于过去的训练或者累积的临床经验。因此您可以吸引患者基于上限五个著名的可以随时改变的话题。您也可以在特定领域为您同事投票以提升他们的名次。

trans-unit.source: Highlight your published studies, add a user-friendly description of the findings, and even answer user questions about it (including Private Conversation requests). You can also add comments to any other published study on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示您发表过的研究，添加易于理解的关于研究发现的描述，甚至还回答用户问题（包括私人对话请求）。您还可以向HealthTap上的任何其他已发布研究添加注释。

trans-unit.source: Build your network of referring doctors and patients on HealthTap. This is one of the top ways to grow your DocScore and gain more visibility.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上建立您的推荐医生和患者网络。这是成长您的DocScore并获得更多知名度的最佳方法之一。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s new Publications feature expands the reach of your expertise. Studies in peer-reviewed publications are now highlighted on HealthTap, directly from your Virtual Practice. Your research will be highlighted to Members looking for related health information on HealthTap, and you can even add to the description of your work. Have comments on an existing study? We’ve got you covered – add comments to the publications and even answer public questions or engage in private conversations with members about any study listed on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的新出版物功能拓展了您的专业知识的范围。发表在同行评审出版物的研究现在突出显示在HealthTap上，直接在您的虚拟实践上可以看到。您的研究将突出显示给在HealthTap上寻找相关健康信息的会员，甚至您可以添加到您的工作描述中。对现有研究有评论吗？我们已经覆盖所有操作 - 向出版物添加评论，甚至回答公众问题，或与会员进行关于HealthTap上列出的任何研究的私人谈话。

trans-unit.source: When a patient is looking for your specific expertise, they will send you a private message. You will have the opportunity to reply and get reimbursed for your time and effort. Reimbursement is based on a fixed rate per initial reply and follow ups. You have the potential to earn from $100–$200/hour with typical usage.
trans-unit.target: 当患者查找您的专业知识时，他们将向您发送一条私人消息。您将有机会回复并得到您的时间和精力的补偿。补偿基于每次初始回复和后续行动的固定费率。在典型用途下您有潜在可能获得每小时$100到$200。

trans-unit.source: When an individual asks you a direct question, their basic information will appear at the top of the screen. Click their name to see their Health Activity and Health Profile.
trans-unit.target: 当患者向您直接提出问题时，他们的基本信息将显示在屏幕顶部。点击他们的名称以查看他们的健康活动和健康档案。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to answer this private message, just click the Answer button. If you don't wish to or aren't able to respond within 72 hours, you can instead click the "Sorry, I cannot help you" button below. Responding in a timely fashion will improve your Responsiveness and your DocScore.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要回答这条私人信息，只需点击回答按钮如果在72小时内您不想回复或无法回复，可以点击下面的“对不起，我无法帮助您”按钮。及时回复会提高您的反应灵敏和您的DocScore。

trans-unit.source: When you provide information that really hits the mark, you are likely to get a “Thank You” in return. Each “Thanks” that you receive gives your Helpfulness a boost! On the other hand, responses that are deemed to have missed the target will potentially be marked as “Not Helpful” and will result in a decrease in Helpfulness. You are more likely to get new private messages if you have a higher Helpfulness score.
trans-unit.target: 当您提供的信息确实解决了问题时，您会得到一个“谢谢”作为回报。每个您收到的“谢谢”都会提高您的乐于助人另一方面，被认为没有解决问题的答复可能被标记为“没有帮助”，并且将影响乐于助人指标。如果您有更高的乐于助人得分，您更有可能获得新的私人消息。

trans-unit.source: If you accept private messages through HealthTap, it is important either to answer questions as you receive them or to indicate that you cannot help right now. If you respond one way or the other within 72 hours, you will maintain a high Responsiveness score. You are more likely to receive new private messages if you have a higher Responsiveness rating.
trans-unit.target: 如果您通过HealthTap接受私人消息，重要的是在您收到问题时回答问题，或者表明您现在无法及时帮助。如果您在72小时内以某种方式回复，您将保持高的反应灵敏分数。如果您的反应灵敏等级较高，则您更有可能收到新的私人信息。

trans-unit.source: If you do not wish to respond, or cannot respond within 72 hours, you have the option of respectfully declining the message (by clicking “Sorry, can’t help right now”) and referring it to a colleague. Responding one way or the other preserves your Responsiveness rating.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在72小时不想回复或无法回复，您可以选择尊重地拒绝该消息（通过点击“对不起，现在无法帮助”），并将其转发给同事。响应单向或其他方式保持您的反应灵敏评级。

trans-unit.source: Your reputation, dictated by your activity and engagement in specific areas on HealthTap, is an important variable in how patients find and connect to you. Patients can filter their searches based on what's important to them.
trans-unit.target: 您的声誉由您在HealthTap上的活动和参与特定领域决定，这是一个患者如何找到并联系您的重要指标。患者可以根据对他们重要的内容来筛选他们的搜索。

trans-unit.source: After searching and filtering, matching doctors are shown in a list that patients can interact. DocScore, Known fors and other important data are shown in a snapshot. One click brings patients to your Virtual Practice or allows them to follow your updates and answers that patients can interact with.
trans-unit.target: 在搜索和过滤之后，匹配的医生将显示在患者可以联系交流的列表中。DocScore，知名的和其他重要数据显示在快照中。患者通过点击进入您的虚拟操作，并关注您的更新与答复。

trans-unit.source: This is where you create Answers to questions on HealthTap. Answers should be concise (400 characters or less), friendly, and helpful. Add Topic tags to improve the visibility and accuracy of your Answers.
trans-unit.target: 这是您在HealthTap上创建问题答案的地方。答案应该简洁（400个字符或更少），友好和有帮助。添加主题标签以提高您的答案的可见性和准确性。

trans-unit.source: When an individual asks you a question, their age, gender, location and relation to your Known fors will become visible to you. You will also be able to see if the individual if this patient is in your HealthTap network.
trans-unit.target: 当用户向您提问时，您会看到他们的年龄，性别，地点和与您著名研究的关系。您还可以看到该患者是否在您的HealthTap网络中。

trans-unit.source: Quickly and easily bring your answers to life by adding pictures and video from your own photo library or the internet. Appropriate images can be used to emphasize the meaning of the information you are providing.
trans-unit.target: 通过从您自己的照片库或互联网添加图片和视频，轻松便捷地为您的生活带来答案。合适的图像可用于强调您提供的信息的含义。

trans-unit.source: Selected medical students from top institutions around the country are personally invited to learn from the HealthTap Medical Expert Network’s best doctors in over 100 specialties. Participants learn how to interpret patient concerns and respond with answers that are both medically accurate and helpful.
trans-unit.target: 来自全国顶级机构的精挑细选的医学生，亲自受邀向HealthTap医学专家网络中超过100个专业的顶级医生学习。参与者学习如何理解病人的关注点，以及用医疗上准确和有帮助的答案回复患者。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap U students review real health questions and assist licensed doctors in creating personalized answers. Experienced doctor mentors review, offer feedback and edit those answers. Work that meets mentors' high clinical standards are cosigned and accepted for online publication.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap U学生回顾真实的健康问题，并帮助有执照的医生创建个性化的答案。经验丰富的医生导师审查，提供反馈和编辑那些答案。满足导师的高临床标准的工作是在网上发布的。

trans-unit.source: Want more specifics? Check out our
trans-unit.target: 需要更多详细信息？查看我们的

trans-unit.source: Ask any health question and get quick answers from thousands of trusted, U.S.-licensed doctors. Get updated on fresh information in a real-time feed.
trans-unit.target: 咨询任何健康问题，并获得来自数千名可信赖的，具有美国医生执照医生的快速答复。更新实时新闻订阅中的新鲜信息。

trans-unit.source: Ask one question; get multiple answers from trusted doctors across the country. Access your own personalized, relevant health feed that’s always up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: 问一个问题; 从全国各地受信任的医生获得多个答案。访问您自己的个性化，相关的始终是最新的新闻订阅.。

trans-unit.source: Receive daily TipTaps on topics that matter most to you. TipTaps are beautiful, bite-sized, tid-bits of health wisdom delivered to you by the world's best doctors!
trans-unit.target: 接收每日TipTaps中对您最重要的主题。TipTaps是由全世界最好的医生提供给您的最杰出的智慧。

trans-unit.source: Access our Doctor Directory to discover the right doctors for you! Search for trusted doctors in your area based on what’s most relevant to you. Make in-person appointments using our easy, digital tools.
trans-unit.target: 访问我们的医生目录，找到适合您的医生！根据与您最相关的内容，搜所您所在地值得信任的医生。使用我们简单的数字工具进行现场预约。

trans-unit.source: Send direct messages to the best doctor to answer your personal question for a small fee. These communications are private and HIPAA-secure. Like a house call, but online!
trans-unit.target: 用少量的费用向最好的医生直接发送消息，以解决私人问题。这些通信是隐私的和HIPAA加密的。就像一个家庭电话，但是是线上的！

trans-unit.source: Skip co-pays by asking doctors private, secure questions online. Save time with our appointment prep sheets.
trans-unit.target: 跳过共同支付，在线询问医生私人安全的问题。通过我们的预约预订表节省时间。

trans-unit.source: Immunizations, procedures, allergies and more: store your health activity in a HIPAA-secure environment online and access to it all at the click of a button or the pinch of a mobile device. We’ll sort it for you, timeline-style, to make it easy to present to your doctor at in-person appointments.
trans-unit.target: 免疫接种，程序，过敏等等：在HIPAA安全环境中将您的健康活动在线存储，并可以在点击按钮或移动设备进行访问。我们会为您按时间表风格排序，使医生在面对面见面中看起其来更容易。

trans-unit.source: with recognition, online reputation control, new patients, increased Internet visibility and even monetary compensation. We’ll also help you get your name out into the mobile world with your own free, personalized app for patients to use.
Do what you do best and get rewarded for it on the go –

for patients to use. Easily customize your photo, logo, and practice name.
trans-unit.target: 为患者使用轻松自定义您的照片，标志和实践名称。

trans-unit.target: 您现在可以和安全的环境中通过移动设备在在线消息与患者沟通。您还将获得您专业知识的报酬。
