At HealthTap, we value trust and quality. That’s why we identify select top doctors in every specialty, and highlight them to patients and peers. We also provide these doctors with special privileges on HealthTap, including membership in ClubMD and status as a HealthTap Scholar.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap，我们重视信任和质量这就是为什么我们在每个专业领域挑选最佳医生，并向患者和同行突出显示。我们还向这些医生提供HealthTap的特殊权限，包括ClubMD的会员身份和HealthTap学者身份。

trans-unit.source: ClubMD members are doctors who regularly participate on HealthTap, and whose peers agree that the content they create and curate is high quality. Membership in this invitation-only club comes with privileges: doctors receive a ClubMD badge on their profile, are highlighted to patients, and help identify and influence the ranking of content on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: ClubMD会员是定期参与HealthTap的医生，而且他们的同行同意他们创建和管理的内容是高质量的。此仅限邀请俱乐部的会员拥有特权：医生在其个人资料上收到ClubMD徽章，突出显示给患者，并且有助于识别和影响HealthTap上内容的排名。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Scholars are a highly select group of leading doctors, and include the most engaged, respected, and helpful experts on HealthTap. The training, career accomplishments, and overall enthusiasm for HealthTap and its mission set these leaders apart. Members of this invitation-only group, identified by the Scholar badge on their profile, play a key role in curating the world’s best health information online.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap学者是一个精挑细选的顶尖医生群组，包括在HealthTap参与度最好，最受尊敬和最有帮助的专家。HealthTap的培训，职业成就和整体热情及其使命使这些领导者分离。这个仅限邀请的群组的会员（由在其个人资料上的学者徽章标识），在管理世界上最好的在线健康信息方面发挥了关键作用。

trans-unit.source: Doctors who are members of the exclusive HealthTap Editorial Board are shaping the future of mobile health through their app recommendations and expert review of health information and services. Doctors who apply or are invited to join the Editorial board guide millions of people to medically accurate and helpful mobile apps and information.
trans-unit.target: 作为独家HealthTap编辑委员会会员的医生正通过其应用程序建议和对健康信息和服务的专业审查来打造移动健康的未来。医生申请或被邀请加入编辑委员会引领数百万人走在医疗准确和有帮助的移动应用程序和信息的道路上。

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Medical School Competition is a friendly inter-school rivalry that highlights you, your classmates, and you alma mater and benefits millions of people everywhere. The challenge centers around the number of people helped on HealthTap, and having more participants gives you a greater chance of rising to the top - so rally your school by inviting alumni to join you in the competition.
trans-unit.target: 医学院比赛是一个友好的学校之间的竞争，突出您，您的同学，您母校以及无处不在的数百万人的利益。挑战集中在HealthTap上帮助的人数，并且参与者越多给您排名上升的机会越大 - 所以通过邀请校友在比赛中加入您以召集学校。

trans-unit.source: The top medical schools will be awarded with special recognition from HealthTap and all participating alumni will be recognized for their contributions, compassion, and expertise. Don't miss your opportunity to become a part of history!
trans-unit.target: 顶级医学院校将获得HealthTap的特别认可，所有参加校友将被认可其贡献，慈悲心和专业知识。不要错过可以成为历史一部分的机会！

trans-unit.source: What you are "Known For" is a reflection of the advanced training you've received combined with your interests and the experiences you've had in your practice. You deserve tremendous recognition for your knowledge and expertise, and we want to give it it to you!
trans-unit.target: 您因什么而闻名是结合您的兴趣和您在实践中的经验所得到的先进训练的反映。您应该得到许多关于您的知识和专长的认可，而我们想给它授予给您！

trans-unit.source: Do you find yourself sometimes asking other moms how to deal with health-related questions for your pregnancy or children and wish someone could validate their opinions? What if all your trusted friends also had a medical degree? Wouldn’t that be nice?
trans-unit.target: 您发现自己有时会问其他妈妈如何处理与怀孕或孩子的健康相关问题，并希望有人可以证实他们的意见？如果您所有的信任朋友也有医学学位怎么办？那不是很好嘛？

trans-unit.source: You’ve seen it all firsthand as a mom — chickenpox at the age of 2, strep throat at the age of 5, a broken arm at 7, and countless runny noses. Your combined personal and professional experience as a “Doctor Mom” equips you with unique knowledge that enables you to truly connect with other moms. As a participating Doctor Mom you’ll be able to help women everywhere and:
trans-unit.target: 作为妈妈您在第一时间经历了这些- 2岁得水痘，5岁喉咙长链球菌，7岁手臂骨折，还有无数次流鼻涕。您作为“医生妈妈”的个人和专业经验使您具有独特的知识，让您真实地与其他妈妈沟通。作为一个参与其中的医生妈妈，您将能够帮助世界各地的女性：

trans-unit.source: With HealthTap you can now connect directly with a doctor who’s also a mom for an answer based on her first-hand experience. Doctor Moms have raised children of their own and can provide a special perspective:
trans-unit.target: 通过HealthTap，您现在可以直接与医生，同时也是一个妈妈沟通得到答复，基于她的第一手经验。医生妈妈亲自养育自己的孩子，她们可以提供一个特别的视角：

trans-unit.source: Become a Doctor Mom
Ask a Doctor Mom
Your app. Your reputation. Your patients.
trans-unit.target: 您的应用程序。您的声誉。您的患者。

trans-unit.source: At HealthTap, we believe that the way to improve health care is through innovation and teamwork. Our APIs grant access to HealthTap's powerful wealth of knowledge and reputation data, an ever-expanding bank of high-quality content created by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors every day. Connect with us to power your apps with the world's' first Interactive Health engine.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap，我们相信，改善医疗保健的方式是通过创新和团队合作。我们的API允许访问HealthTap的强大丰富的知识和信誉数据，一个每天不断扩大的高质量内容由数以千计的美国医疗执照医生创建的数据库。与我们联系，通过世界上第一个互动健康引擎为您的应用程序提供支持。

trans-unit.source: Provide doctors a simple, secure method to log in to your app. Allow them to skip the sign-up process and reduce friction to engage.
trans-unit.target: 为医生提供一种简单，安全的方法来登录到您的应用程序。允许他们跳过注册过程并减少互动中的摩擦。

trans-unit.source: For the first time ever, you can access comprehensive national data about who doctors trust and send their patients to, or treat patients with at the same time. You can have visibility and access to the "Circle of Trust" of any doctor on HealthTap!
trans-unit.target: 第一次，您可以访问全面的国家数据，关于医生信任谁以及把病人推荐给谁，或谁在同一时间治疗病人。您可以看到和访问HealthTap上的任何医生的“信任圈”！

trans-unit.source: Want to use HealthTap in a unique way? We'll work with you. If you have a compelling application of our data or services and our existing API calls don't meet your needs,
trans-unit.target: 想以独特的方式使用HealthTap吗？我们将与您合作。如果您有令人信服关于我们的数据或服务的申请，而我们现有的API调用不能满足您的需求，

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Developer Network hosted the first-ever Interactive Health Hack-a-thon ("hacking4health") in 2010. The event was a runaway hit with Silicon Valley developers who gathered in HealthTap's office to build innovative data-based health apps.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap开发网络在2010年主办了首次健康互动编程马拉松（“hacking4health”）。这次事件对于聚集在HealthTap办公室创建革新基于数据的健康应用程序的硅谷开发商是一个失控的打击。

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap's developer team is smart, agile and builds to your needs. Want to retrieve the data in a certain way that they don't support? They will work with you until you have a solution."
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap的开发团队很聪明、敏捷，并能满足您的需求。想要以某种方式检索他们不支持的数据？他们会与你一起工作，直到你有一个解决方案。

trans-unit.source: "Software developers have never had access to such a rich set of customized health data. HealthTap's API will serve as the de-facto data platform for third-party developers to leverage as they embark on an effort to revolutionize health care."
trans-unit.target: 软件开发人员从来没有访问过如此丰富的定制的健康数据。HealthTap的API将为第三方开发人员在他们开始努力革新医疗保健时借贷收购提供事实上的数据平台。

trans-unit.source: "We love the power that HealthTap unleashes to doctors and patients – and we wanted the reproduce that functionality for our community. So rather than re-inventing the wheel, we plugged our users directly into their service, and are unlocking the power of doctor-patient interaction right within our own web portal. Integration took us a fraction of the time it would have taken us to develop an inferior solution from scratch."
trans-unit.target: 我们赞许HealthTap为医生和患者带来的能量- 并且我们希望为我们的社区提供这种功能。因此，相对于重新着手于新方向，我们直接将服务应用到用户上，并且解锁了医患交流的权限整体化使我们利用时间间隙从零基础到开发了一个最低级的解决方案。

After approval, you'll receive a private API key, full documentation, and a liaison on our Product & Engineering team to support you throughout your integration.

ClubMD membership is by special invitation only to a select group of the most active experts on HealthTap who create the highest quality, accurate, compassionate and helpful answers to member questions. We review the activities of experts, and select a limited number of experts to invite to ClubMD each month. Selection is based on the number and quality of helpful answers given, and on the number and quality of peer review Agrees. If you would like to be considered, feel free to let us know by sending an email to
trans-unit.target: ClubMD会员制度只邀请了HealthTap最活跃的专家，他们将会提高最好质量，准确，热情的以及有助的回答我们每月都会审核专家的工作，并且邀请数名专家进入ClubMD。筛选是基于专家给出的有用答案的数量和质量，以及同行评审对于专家回答的同意的数量和质量。可以通过HealthTap的媒体区访问演讲和媒体访谈。

trans-unit.source: With millions of new mobile devices activated every day, the proliferation of health and wellness apps has the potential to revolutionize how patients gain access to the best information and health services. Currently, there are more than 40,000 mobile health applications, and they vary widely in quality, helpfulness, and medical accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 随着每天几百万的移动设备被激活，健康养生方面的应用程序将会不停地升级，提供给病人最好的信息和健康服务目前，有4万多个手机健康应用程序，它们在质量，乐于助人和医疗准确性方面差异很大。

trans-unit.source: We believe that the best doctors can help millions of people identify which applications are the most useful and helpful. To facilitate this, we’ve created an Editorial Board to which the best doctors in the HealthTap Network are invited.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信最好的医生是可以帮助数百万人找到哪些应用是最有效并且有用的。为促进健康应用更有效的使用，我们已为HealthTap平台最好的医生创建了一块编辑页面。

trans-unit.source: Members of the exclusive HealthTap Doctor Editorial Board are shaping the future of mobile health through their app recommendations. Application to the Editorial Board is simple:
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 独家医生编辑板块的会员将通过应用程序的建议塑造手机客户端的未来。向编辑部的申请很简单：

trans-unit.source: With more than 40,000 mobile health and wellness apps, the opportunities to improve our health and well-being are growing fast, but so are overwhelming feelings of confusion. If you’ve ever browsed health apps you’ll know how difficult it is to measure the quality, reliability, and helpfulness of an app. To help you find the best apps for you and your loved ones, HealthTap’s AppRx is bringing together tens of thousands of the world’s leading doctors to:
trans-unit.target: 随着超过4万个手机健康应用程序的使用，我们的健康和福利的被提升的机会也将大幅度增加，但同时也造成了是大量的困惑如果您曾经浏览过健康应用程序，你会知道判断一个应用程序的质量，可靠性和帮助性是多么困难。为了帮助您和您的亲人找到最好的应用程序，HealthTap的AppRx汇集了成千上万的世界领先的医生：

Building a world-changing platform is exciting, inspiring, and challenging. Trying to make a change in people’s lives for the better is even more so. It takes the smartest and most compassionate people, with deep problem-solving capabilities, multidisciplinary skills, the ability to reduce comprehensive complex systems to their essence, and a thorough kindness of heart to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 建立一个改变世界的平台是令人兴奋，鼓舞人心和充满挑战的。试图改变人们的生活，使人们的生活越来越好它需要最聪明和最富同情心的人去达到成功，这些人需要具有解决深层问题能力，掌握多学科技能，具有化繁为简直接找到事情本质与核心的能力，以及一颗十分善良的心。

trans-unit.source: Passionate and extraordinarily talented engineers, caring doctors, humanistic business mavericks, and health mavens. Check. Data nuts, design aficionados, word lovers, security experts, community activists, and thought-leaders. Double check.
trans-unit.target: 热情有才的工程师，有关怀心的医生，人文商业奇才和健康专家。检查。数据爱好者，设计爱好者，文字爱好者，安全专家，社区活动家和思想领袖。双重检查。

trans-unit.source: We believe our ability to marry healthcare and technology will have a great impact on the world, and will prolong the life expectancy of humankind. We’re excited about improving the efficiency of care, while enhancing the quality of people’s lives, and making people’s feel good every day.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信我们与医疗技术紧密联系的能力将对世界产生巨大影响，并将延长人类的预期寿命。我们很高兴提高护理效率，同时提高人们的生活质量，使人们每天都感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: We value health and happiness. This means that you get full health benefits (health, dental, vision), one of Silicon Valley’s best PTO policies, healthy catered lunches, dinners, and snacks throughout the day, lots of great company events and outings, subsidized gym memberships, yearly retreats to fun places, and much, much more.
trans-unit.target: 我们珍视健康和幸福。这意味着您将获得全面的医疗福利（健康，牙科，视力），硅谷最好的PTO政策之一，全天候健康的午餐，晚餐和小吃，许多公司活动和郊游，健身房会员补贴，每年休假去有趣的地方，以及更多福利。

trans-unit.source: Next step
SmartHealth
What is "SmartHealth"?

SmartHealth is an extension of the Waikato DHB that allows the Waikato DHB to provide some of its health services in a virtualised manner (e.g. – the clinician and the patient can meet virtually via a computer, tablet, or smartphone rather than being in the same room face to face).
Q & A / Inform

The Q & A / Inform service allows registered users to login to SmartHealth and search existing answers provided by qualified clinicians to health related questions. It also allows users to anonymously type in new questions that can then be answered by one or more qualified clinicians. Don't include information that identifies you (like your name) in questions posted to the QA / Inform area. Remember, doctors answering these questions will not see your Profile, so if your question requires a personal response, please do a virtual consult.
There are two types of virtual consultations: Text and Video. All consultations are pre-booked appointments where a clinician and patient meet virtually through SmartHealth.
At Waikato District Health Board ("Waikato DHB"), your privacy is important to us. This document gives you details about SmartHealth and how your information will be used and kept secure.
Information that you provide or that your carer(s) provide to you while using SmartHealth services will be used to deliver health information and services to you and provide you with better care.

When you sign up to use SmartHealth, you will be asked to provide a range of information about yourself. This information along with your email address and password becomes your "Profile". The information that you will be asked for includes:

The minimum information that you must provide in order to use SmartHealth services are your name, email address and password. Giving more information will help your carer(s) provide you with better services and help you get more accurate information when using some of the self-service options within SmartHealth.

A "Consult" within SmartHealth system will allow you to have either a video (using a computer, a video camera and a microphone) consultation or a typed / text consultation with a Waikato DHB clinician. During the consultation, the Waikato DHB clinician will update information about the consultation (e.g. information they provided you during the consultation such as diagnosis or treatment). This information will be stored in SmartHealth system and also sent to update your clinical record maintained at Waikato DHB and the Primary Health Organisation (e.g. your GP) that you are registered with, just as if they saw you in person.

A cookie is a tiny little file that's stored on your computer. It contains the address of the Web site and codes that your internet browser sends back to the Web site each time you visit a page there. Cookies from SmartHealth do not contain personal information or anything dangerous; they are useful in making your experience with SmartHealth a better experience. When you browse the Web and access a Web page, the Web server needs to know who you are if you want to do things that require logging in or putting items in a virtual shopping cart or completing any other process that requires that the Web site remember information about you as you move from page to page.
The information that you enter into SmartHealth will be used to provide you:
The information that you enter into SmartHealth will be used by clinician(s):

The information that you provide in your profile along with the information that the clinicians record while providing you services via SmartHealth will be stored in one or more of the following places:
In order to meet both the New Zealand government and the Waikato DHB regulations, your information will be stored for up to 20 years following the date of your last treatment or care.

Generally only your team of clinicians from the Waikato DHB and your Primary Health Organisation will have access to your information. However, on occasion SmartHealth staff, Waikato DHB staff or others authorised by the Waikato DHB may also need to access your information in order to ensure that the system is working correctly, to fix any issues that might arise and/or to respond to any complaints, questions or concerns.
Reminders (email and mobile notifications) to help you stay engaged with your health. You can manage the frequency and types of communications you receive by updating your account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 提醒（电子邮件和手机通知）将帮助您保持健康。您可以通过更新帐户设置来管理收到的信息的频率和类型。

trans-unit.source: On a private, safe and highly secured computer storage system in the United States of America (called a "Cloud"). This system meets the information security standards of the United States of America and New Zealand.
trans-unit.target: 在美国，一个私人的，安全和高度安全的计算机存储系统（称为“云”）。这个系统符合美国和新西兰的信息安全标准。

trans-unit.source: On the secure clinical records systems maintained by the Waikato DHB. The same as if you met with a clinician face to face.

trans-unit.source: On the secure clinical records systems of your Primary Health Organisation (such as a GP practice), if you are registered with one of these organisations. The same as if you met with a GP face to face.

trans-unit.source: but they're accurate. It makes me feel at ease as a new mom.
trans-unit.target: 而且是准确的。作为一个新的妈妈它让我很安心。

trans-unit.source: Modern medicine and healthcare too often emphasize “health” over “care,” focusing more on treatments and medications than on the human aspect of care. As patients, we have few opportunities to show our appreciation for the doctors who help us during challenging times.
trans-unit.target: 现代医疗注重于强调”健康”超过”关怀”，更注重于治疗和药物而不是人自身方面的关怀。作为患者，我们很少有机会向在艰难时期帮助我们的医生表示感谢。

trans-unit.source: “Thanks doc!” is multimedia art installation taking viewers on a symbolic journey of care and gratitude, and highlighting the impact of caring for others by sharing knowledge and showing compassion. The piece uses actual words of thanks that patients have shared with doctors, demonstrating the often unspoken appreciation we feel for the doctors who help us overcome adversity and tend to us when we need it most.
trans-unit.target: “谢谢您，医生！”的多媒体艺术让观看者通过这些文字符号来表达关怀和感激，并且强调通过分享知识和表现同情对关爱他人的重要影响。患者通过使用特定的语言文字与医生分享他们内心的感激，证明我们虽然不常用语言来表达但我们还是十分感谢他们帮助我们度过苦难以及在最需要他们的时候无条件靠近陪伴。

trans-unit.source: The series of 18 panels (above) combines images of doctors with thank-you notes from patients. The installation was first displayed at the Stanford MedicineX Conference at the Stanford School of Medicine on September 29–30, 2012.
trans-unit.target: 18个面板系列（上图）结合了医生的图像和患者的感谢信。2012年9月29日至30日这个装置第一次在斯坦福大学的医学会议中展出。

trans-unit.source: Artists: Ron Gutman and Kathleen Donahue
trans-unit.target: 艺术家：Ron Gutman和Kathleen Donahue

trans-unit.source: As a patient consulting with doctors on HealthTap, you agree to engage with the practitioner in a respectful and appropriate manner. You agree to refrain from using inappropriate language and/or behavior.
trans-unit.target: 作为与HealthTap医生协商的患者，您同意以尊重和适当的方式与医生交流。您同意不使用不当的语言和/或行为。

trans-unit.source: You agree that you may not make demands for treatment in a consultation. Please understand that there are three types of virtual consults on HealthTap:
trans-unit.target: 您同意您不会在咨询中提出治疗要求。请理解HealthTap的三种类型的虚拟咨询：

trans-unit.source: Standard virtual consults: In these consults, doctors who have accepted you as a patient (whether for “on call” care, unless you already have an ongoing care relationship with the doctor) can provide care. You may receive an examination (within the limits of virtual care), provide a medical history, obtain an assessment from a physician, and receive a treatment plan as determined to be medically appropriate by the consulting doctor.
trans-unit.target: 标准虚拟咨询：在这些咨询中，接受您作为患者的医生（无论是否为“在职”护理，除非您已经与医生有持续的护理关系）可以提供护理。您可以接受检查（在虚拟护理的限制内），提供病史，获得医生的评估，并接受咨询医生觉得在医学上合适的治疗计划。

trans-unit.source: Introductory Consult: this is the first interaction with a new doctor or a doctor who has not yet accepted you as a patient on HealthTap. An introductory consult is not intended for the doctor to give you care. Introductory consults are for providing you with information or get to know the doctor and to determine if she or he can help you with your health concern (in person and/or through virtual consults). A doctor may need to invite you to her or his office for an in person appointment in order to accept you as a patient on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 介绍性咨询：这是第一次在HealthTap上与一个新医生或尚未接受您作为患者的医生互动。介绍性咨询的目的不是为了医生给您提供照顾。介绍性咨询是为您提供信息或了解医生，并确定她或他是否可以帮助您解决您的健康问题（亲自和/或通过虚拟咨询）。医生可能会邀请您到她或他的办公室进行个人预约，以接受您作为HealthTap上的患者。

trans-unit.source: Second opinion consult: this is a consult in which a doctor can provide you with information about a health issue or a second opinion on a prior diagnosis. A new diagnosis, treatment, or other care are not available in a second opinion consult.
trans-unit.target: 第二意见咨询：这是一个医生可以向您提供有关健康问题的信息或关于先前诊断的第二意见的咨询。在第二意见咨询中将不提供新的诊断，治疗或其他护理。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is intended to give you easy access to health information (and even care) on your computer or mobile device. As a HealthTap patient (with a HealthTap Prime membership or other access to consulting doctors on HealthTap), you are entitled to receive medically necessary and appropriate care, and you agree not to abuse or overuse the access to doctors provided to you. Overuse includes requests for multiple opinions on single medical condition HealthTap consults should not be used : to obtain numerous opinions on a single medical condition. In general, doctors may discourage this practice and may be hesitant to provide an assessment to those patients who attempt to seek multiple consults. In cases where there is an absolute medical necessity, it may be appropriate to do more than one consult in a day about a specific health issue, but you may also need to consider seeking in-person care or emergency services if the level of severity truly is at the point where multiple consults are warranted (especially if in-person care is recommended by a consulting doctor on HealthTap).
trans-unit.target: HealthTap旨在让您轻松访问您计算机或移动设备上的健康信息（甚至护理）。作为HealthTap患者（具有HealthTap 黄金会员资格或其他访问HealthTap上的咨询医生的资格），您有权获得必要和适当的医疗护理，您同意不会滥用或过度使用医生的访问权。过度使用包括对单一医疗状况的多个意见的请求。HealthTap咨询不会被用于：在单个医疗状况下获得许多意见。一般来说，医生可能不鼓励这种做法，可能会犹豫向那些试图寻求多方咨询的患者提供评估。在有绝对医疗必要性的情况下，在一天内就一个特定的健康问题进行多次咨询是可行的，但如果严重程度的真实性是多方咨询所担保的，您可能需要考虑寻求面对面的护理或紧急服务（特别是如果面对面护理是HealthTap咨询医生推荐的）。

trans-unit.source: Even if you believe you need a prescription or lab test, you should not expect a prescription or lab test order from any given consult. Patients who are located outside the U.S. may receive prescription recommendations only; lab orders are not currently possible for patients located outside the U.S. If the practitioner deems it appropriate to prescribe treatment or order lab tests for the condition discussed in a virtual consult, then the prescription or lab test(s) may be ordered by the physician. Lab tests are currently ordered using Quest Diagnostics lab test services; it may not be possible to order all of Quest Diagnostics lab tests (if any) in all U.S. states at this time. . The following medication categories cannot be prescribed or recommended in virtual consults on HealthTap: DEA category I-IV medications, lifestyle medications (such as weight loss or hair loss medication), and U.S.-state regulated medications. It may be possible to get prescriptions for some psychiatric medications in HealthTap Concierge virtual consults, but doctors cannot prescribe psychiatric medications in HealthTap Prime virtual consults.
trans-unit.target: 即使您相信您需要处方或实验室测试，您也不应该期望任何给定咨询的处方或实验室测试。位于美国境外的患者只能获得处方建议; 实验室下单目前不能用于位于美国境外的患者。如果医生认为在虚拟咨询中对于讨论的病症开处方或预定实验室测试是合适的，则处方或实验室测试可以由医生订购。实验室测试目前使用Quest Diagnostics实验室测试服务; 目前可能无法在美国所有州订购所有Quest Diagnostics实验室测试（如果有）。.以下药物类别不能出现在HealthTap的虚拟咨询的处方或推荐中：DEA类别I-IV药物，生活用药（例如减肥或脱发药物）和美国国家管制药物。有可能在HealthTap Concierge虚拟咨询中获得一些精神病药物的处方，但医生不能在HealthTap Prime虚拟咨询中开精神病药物的处方。

trans-unit.source: There are cases when you may present with a condition that is long-standing for which you may have been taking a prescription for a long period of time. Even in this situation, it is up to the consulting doctor’s medical expertise and discretion to decide to order that prescription and for what duration. Please understand that in HealthTap Prime virtual consults, you and the doctor most likely do not have an established doctor-patient relationship, and best practice will be for the doctor to prescribe (if at all) a short-course of medication to hold you over until you are able to consult with your established doctor.
trans-unit.target: 这些情况是当您可能会出现长期存在的病症，您可能已经长期服用处方。即使在这种情况下，还是取决于咨询医生的医疗专业知识和自由裁量决定是否订购处方和持续时间。请理解，在HealthTap Prime虚拟咨询中，您和医生很可能没有确定的医患关系，最佳实践将是医生给您开短期药物治疗的处方（如果有的话）， 直到您能够咨询到您的指定医生。

trans-unit.source: If you signed up for a free trial or limited-period discount HealthTap Prime account, and allow the trial or discount period to expire, your account will automatically convert to a standard paid subscription account (starting your full-price subscription period and recurring charges). For the first month of your full-price paid subscription only, you have a 72-hour grace period to notify HealthTap Support in writing if you do not want to continue the subscription and/or to request a refund of your first month’s full-price subscription fee. This grace-period does not apply if you have engaged in one or more consults after the free-trial period. You may cancel your subscription at any time, and your subscription will be valid through the then current pre-paid month. HealthTap does not offer partial-month refunds.
trans-unit.target: 如果您注册了一个免费试用或时段限制的折扣HealthTap黄金会员账户，并允许试验或折扣期到期，您的帐户将自动转换为一个标准的付费订阅帐户(开始您的全价购买订阅期和经常性费用)。只对于您全价购买支付的第一个月的订阅，如果您不愿意继续订阅和/或要求退款全价购买订阅您的第一个月的费用，您有一个72小时的宽限期来书面通知HealthTap支持。在免费试用期之后，如果您有参与一个或更多的咨询，那么这个宽限期将不适用。您可以在任何时候取消您的订阅,然后您的订阅将通过目前预付费生效。HealthTap不提供分批月份退款。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime offers primary-care consults from specific physicians on HealthTap only. Consults for specialist care are not available on HealthTap Prime. HealthTap Prime consults are available under an “on call” model where you will be connected with the first-available HealthTap Prime physician. If you wish to or do select a specific doctor (including specialists) to consult, these consults are part of the HealthTap Concierge service, are not included in your HealthTap Prime subscription, and are subject to additional per-consult fees. HealthTap Prime may not cover the cost of consults that originated from searching for a specific doctor or specialty. Pricing for any Concierge consults will be shown prior to initiating such consults and by participating in such a consult you agree to pay the fees associated with such a consult.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime黄金会员仅在HealthTap上提供特定医生的初级保健咨询。HealthTap Prime不提供专家护理的咨询服务。HealthTap Prime咨询可在“即时”模式下使用，您将与首个可用的HealthTap Prime医生联系。如果您希望或选择特定的医生（包括专家）咨询，这些咨询是HealthTap礼宾服务的一部分，但不包括在您的HealthTap Prime订阅，并且需要额外的咨询费。HealthTap Prime黄金会员可能不支付由于寻找特定医生或专业而产生的咨询费用。任何礼宾顾问的价格将在开始此类咨询之前显示，并通过参与此类咨询，您同意支付与此类咨询相关的费用。

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for monitoring your financial accounts and statements, and HealthTap is not responsible for any charges actually or allegedly not authorized by any account holder. In the event that HealthTap agrees to provide you with a refund for any reason (including but not limited to claims of unauthorized charges), the maximum refund to which you will be entitled is sixty (60) days from the time of purchase. Unsubscribing from messages from HealthTap and/or uninstalling the HealthTap app do not automatically cancel any subscriptions you have on HealthTap, nor do these actions cancel your obligations to pay for any such subscriptions still active on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您负责监控您的财产账户和报表，并且HealthTap不负责实际的或所谓据称的未经任何账户持有人授权的任何费用。如果HealthTap同意以任何理由（包括但不限于对未授权费用的索赔）向您退款，您将享有自购买之日起六十（60）天的最大退款金额。取消订阅来自HealthTap的消息和/或卸载HealthTap应用程序不会自动取消您在HealthTap上的任何订阅，这些操作也不会取消您支付在HealthTap上仍处于活动状态的任何订阅的义务。您可以随时取消订阅，您的订阅将在当前预付月份之前有效。不要张贴广告或请求或链接到其他网站或个人。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to apply your health insurance coverage to virtual consults with eligible doctors (where available), simply select Insurance under Payment Information to confirm coverage and your copay. trans-unit.source: About the reviews & methodology

With more than 65,742 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, we have 1,623,598 years of clinical experience on tap. We have asked our doctors to use this experience to rate the effectiveness and clinical usefulness of thousands of medications for medical conditions and other indications.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的医疗专家网络拥有65742名医生，总计1,623,598年的临床经验随时可供您参考使用。我们要求医生根据这些临床经验对数以千计的药物做出有效性和临床帮助度的评分。

trans-unit.source: The result: HealthTap RateRx, the world’s first (and only) large-scale doctor rating of the effectiveness of drugs and treatments.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap RateRx，世界上第一个（并且是唯一一个）大型的对药物与治疗有效性进行医生评分的系统。

trans-unit.source: A new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, RateRx presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice in more than 137 specialties. RateRx is the first national survey of U.S.-licensed doctors, soliciting independent feedback from physicians across the country about their real-world clinical experience treating a broad range of common conditions, and rating the medications used in those treatments. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个对于医生和病人来说都全新、独立的资源，RateRx提供对于药物治疗有效性的评分。这些药物治疗是美国数以千计的执照医生通过在超过137个专业领域的临床实践得出的。RateRx是第一个对于美国执照医生的全国性调查，征求全国的医生基于他们广泛临床经验的独立反馈，并对治疗手段中所使用的药物进行评分。RateRx代表了第一个针对有经验的医生在他们各自的专业领域所使用的治疗特定情况病人的手段的全面性评估。与其他研究在特定的情况下评价治疗有效性不同的是，RateRx希望获得顶级医生深入而长期的实际经验来获取最佳治疗方法。

trans-unit.source: The RateRx study was conducted by HealthTap. HealthTap collects extensive information from doctors on, among other topics, the treatments of all health-related issues.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap从医生那里广泛收集所有其他方面有关健康问题的信息。

trans-unit.source: Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Based on their knowledge from clinical experience using the drug for that indication, contributing doctors were instructed to rate medications for their use with specific indications. The combined ratings for each treatment have been summarized into an aggregate rating that reflects doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are publicly visible, and anyone can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.
trans-unit.target: 医生被要求对药品治疗某一症状的临床有效性进行1到5星的打分。基于药品对特定症状的临床经验，参与信息收集的医生被委托对药物治疗的效果用特定的指标进行打分。对每一种治疗的综合评分被整合成代表着医生共同经验的总评分。参与评分的医生的简单资料是公开的，任何人都可以查看医生训练和经验的细节包括他们的领域和资质证书。

trans-unit.source: Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. More than 567,000 doctors were invited to participate in the study (includes more than 67,000 doctors in the HealthTap Medical Expert Network plus 500,000 U.S.-licensed doctors in HealthTap’s extended doctor community). In addition to those doctors invited to contribute to the study, any U.S.-licensed doctor in good standing was eligible to participate by submitting a request to HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 所有声誉良好的美国持证医生都可以参与这次的研究。超过567,000名医生被邀请参与这次的研究（包括超过67,000名HealthTap医疗专家网络的医生以及500,000名HealthTap的大医生团体的美国持证医生。除了被邀请参与研究的医生，任何有良好声誉的美国持证医生都可以通过提交申请参与研究。

trans-unit.source: Doctors could rate any medication for its effectiveness in treating any condition. For common conditions, medications known to be treatments for the conditions were presented alongside the conditions. Doctors could add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included in the list.
trans-unit.target: 对于常见症状，已知的药物治疗方式会在症状的旁边注明。医生可以对任何新的没有在清单里的药物治疗方式添加打分。

trans-unit.source: RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank, based on average weighted ratings, from highest-rated to lowest, and only when there are sufficient data for a meaningful weighted average. The weighted average takes into account both the average rating and the number of ratings, discounting higher average ratings that are based on a smaller number of assessments.
trans-unit.target: RateRx通过一种有次序的排列方式来显示每一种治疗方式对某一症状的效果。这种排列方式基于加权评分，从高到低排列。只有当数据量对于加权平均足够时才会对这一治疗方式其进行排列。加权平均分同时参照了平均分和打分数量，会对高平均分但是打分数量较少的评分进行扣分。

trans-unit.source: To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their "Known-for" topics).
trans-unit.target: 为了保证医生评估的无偏性，医生无法看到他同行已经打好的分数直到他自己输入了评分。推荐一旦被提交就无法更改，但是在提交打分之后，医生可以查看其它医生的评分并进行评论。患者可以从这种医生集体智慧中受益，让他们能够看到对相同症状的不同治疗方式是如何被评分与评价的。医生会从他的同事的评分和评价中受益，能够通过查看参与评价的医生的资料来理解这些信息（资料展现了医生的教育背景和经历，他们的专长领域的训练，实践的年数，DocScore和他们的”Known-for”专题）。

trans-unit.source: Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, but do not change the numeric value of the rating.
trans-unit.target: 评论作为一种可选的评价方式，经常被医生用来解释打分，或者用来分享药物是如何针对每一种症状被使用的细节。评论可以被阅读和评价，但是不会在数字上影响评分。

trans-unit.source: Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication.
trans-unit.target: 打分是基于药品的通用名称的，但是也会显示品牌名称，准许医生对特定的药品进行评分。该调查不会区分不同品牌的药物对同一种药物治疗方式的评分。

trans-unit.source: The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors were encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的针对每种症状的药物治疗方式已被列出以便评分，但是我们鼓励医生为任何一种症状添加治疗方式以保证新的治疗方式被纳入其中。医生被指示只有当他们有使用过某种药物治疗方式治疗特定的被讨论的症状，并且发现这种药物治疗方式对这种症状有效时才能将这种先前没有出现的药物治疗方式加入标准治疗方式的清单中。

trans-unit.source: RateRx is a living work. As an open and ongoing feature on the HealthTap platform, any U.S.-licensed doctor in good standing can contribute to this data at any time. RateRx data reflect the ongoing feedback and ratings provided by doctors based on their real-world use of medications in treating patients, serving as a unique, continuously updated resource for the efficacy of both existing and new treatments.
trans-unit.target: 正是因为HealthTap平台有着开放的并且持续发展的特征，任何有良好声誉的美国持证医生都可以在任何时候完善数据。RateRx的数据反映了医生基于现实中对患者的药物治疗的实时的反馈和评分，这些数据为现有的和新的治疗方式提供了独一无二的，同时也是最新的资源。

trans-unit.source: . Content, including AppRx ratings and report results, may be licensed from HealthTap. For details contact
trans-unit.target: .包括AppRx评分和报告的结果在内的内容，可以从HealthTap得到授权。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not recommend or endorse any specific content or other information mentioned on our service. Please remember, that content on HealthTap (including but not limited to treatment options and ratings listed in RateRx): (i) is provided for informational and educational purposes only, and is designed to be used with common sense, and in connection with the advice of your doctor or healthcare provider; (ii) is for personal, household, educational use of a single individual, and commercial use or commercial distribution of any content is prohibited. For more information please see
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不推荐任何在我们的服务中提到的特定内容或其他的信息。请记住，HealthTap中的内容（包括但不限于在RateRx中列出的治疗选项和评分）(i)是仅为获取信息和教育的目的提供的，需要与常识，您的医生或者医疗保健提供商的建议相配合；(ii)是为个人，家庭，个人的教育而提供的，内容的商业用途或者商业性传播都是被禁止的。获得更多信息，请查看

trans-unit.source: A difference of less than 0.5 stars between treatments may not be statistically significant or meaningful. Differences of greater than 0.5 stars between two treatments displayed are always statistically significant. The weighted average rating is a Bayesian estimate of the true average rating, given the observed ratings so far. The formula combines the global mean rating (3.3 stars) with the observations as follows:
trans-unit.target: 不同治疗方法之间小于0.5星差距可能在统计学意义上不显著。两种治疗方法有大于0.5星的差异是一直在统计学意义上显著的。已有的评分的加权平均是真实平均评分的贝叶斯估计。方程根据以下的方式将全球平均评分（3.3星）和观测结合在一起：

trans-unit.source: (r = estimate of average rating, q = number of ratings, μ = average of the observed ratings):
trans-unit.target: （r=估计平均评分，q=评分的数量，μ=观测到的平均评分）：

trans-unit.source: The information we request at registration. That we do not use or share your Personally Identifiable Information, other than as described in our Privacy Statement

trans-unit.source: When we say we care about your privacy, we mean it. Privacy policies are important documents, but many people don't read them because they are long, confusing, and written in "legalese."
trans-unit.target: 隐私政策是重要的文件，但是许多人不阅读他们引文他们长，令人迷惑并且用法律术语撰写。

trans-unit.source: We've designed our Privacy Statement with you in mind, creating links to the most common questions about HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services (including Prime and Concierge) and how these services work where privacy issues may be involved. Everything in written in plain, easy to understand language.
trans-unit.target: 我们与您在心中编撰了隐私权声明，创建关于HealthTap和HealthTap Premium Services（包括基础费用和管理费用）的最常见的问题和当会牵涉隐私事项时这些服务是如何来运作的链接。

trans-unit.source: that describes our core beliefs about privacy and your core rights as a user of our services. These documents are located on our
trans-unit.target: 描述了对隐私的核心观念和您作为我们服务使用者的核心权利。

trans-unit.source: By continuing to use HealthTap, you agree to this Privacy Statement and any updates to it. This means that if the Privacy Statement changes, you agree to these changes if you keep using HealthTap. When this policy is changed (other than for typographical corrections or minor changes that do not alter its meaning), we will update the "last modified" date at the top of the policy. We may provide a summary at the bottom of the policy, describing the types of changes made.
trans-unit.target: 您持续使用HealthTap代表您同意隐私声明和它的任何更新。这意味着如果隐私声明改变了，您保持使用HealthTap的行为代表您同意这些改变。当政策改变了（除了印刷错误或者不改变意思的不重要改变），我们会会在政策的最顶部更新“最近一次修改”的日期。我们会在政策的底部提供一个总结，描述做出改变的类型。

trans-unit.source: Your use of HealthTap is anonymous. Your Personally Identifiable Information (your real name, date of birth, email address and other such information) is not visible to others. Staying anonymous on HealthTap is easy - simply don't post personally identifiable information (such as your name) in your questions or other content visible to others.
trans-unit.target: 您的个人身份信息（真实姓名，出生日期，邮箱地址和其他同类信息）不对其他人可见。在HealthTap上保持匿名是容易的-只要不要在您的问题或其他可以被其他人看到的内容中，发布个人身份信息。

trans-unit.source: No. Your questions are anonymous. Only the questions, not your identity, are publicly visible.

Like an in-person patient-doctor interaction, HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge are confidential but not anonymous services. When using Premium Services, some Profile information (including your real name and health information from your Profile) is visible to doctors with whom you enter into consults. Your personal contact information is never visible on HealthTap to other members or doctors.

trans-unit.source: Yes. HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services use bank-level security and encryption. We meet HIPAA security standards for all interactions subject to HIPAA security regulations. Your Profile contains the information you provide when you create a HealthTap account, including your name, email address and date of birth. You can add optional health information to your Profile, like personal data, health goals, medications, conditions, and other information, which helps to personalize your HealthTap experience. You choose what health information to add to your Profile through using HealthTap and adding information to your Profile.
trans-unit.target: 您的个人简述包含当您创建HealthTap账户时提供的信息，包括您的名字，邮箱和出生日期。您可以选择性的添加健康信息到您的个人简述中，比如您的个人数据，健康目标，药物治疗，症状和其他信息，这些信息可以帮助您个人化您的HealthTap体验。您在使用HealthTap并添加信息到您的个人简述时，可以选择在您的个人简述中添加什么健康信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can add, edit or delete optional information appearing in your Profile at any time. You can edit, but not remove, certain information (like an email address) required for login and to use HealthTap, and doctor consult notes. You have a "right to amend" your health records and can add information to your consult notes or health record to make it more accurate or complete, or have a disagreement with noted in your health record, or update other profile information by submitting a request to HealthTap support (by phone, secure online form submission or email).
trans-unit.target: 是的，您可以在任何时候添加，编辑或删除出现在您资料中的选择性添加的信息。您可以编辑，但是不能移除注册，使用HealthTap和医生咨询记录需要提供的信息（如电子邮箱地址）。您“有权利修改”您的健康记录并且可以在您的咨询记录或者健康记录上添加信息来使您的信息更加精确或完整。您可以对您的健康记录中的记录提出异议，也可以通过提交获得HealthTap支持的申请来上传其他的个人资料信息（通过手机或者邮箱提交安全的在线表格）。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap other members and doctors cannot see your Profile or the health information in it. When using HealthTap Prime or Concierge, health information from your Profile and basic information about you (such as your real name and age) are visible to the doctors with whom you consult.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上其他的成员和医生不可以查看您在这里的资料或健康信息。当使用HealthTap Prime或特邀时，您资料中的健康信息和您的基本信息（如您的真名和年龄）对您咨询的医生可见。

Additionally, you can opt out of receiving most emails by selecting the unsubscribe link at the bottom of any email, and opt out of mobile messages by replying "STOP" to any message. You can update your communications details and preferences at any time in your account Settings.

trans-unit.source: We use information collected through your use of HealthTap to provide you with information about our current or future services, to enable the services we provide, and otherwise as described in this Privacy Statement. This Privacy Statement describes the ways that we use or disclose your information. In support of these uses, we may use personal information to:
trans-unit.target: 我们使用在您使用HealthTap过程中我们收集到的信息，为您提供我们现在或将来提供的服务的信息，也让我们提供的服务得以实现，除此以外您的信息将会根据隐私权声明中叙述的条款处理。这份隐私声明描述了我们使用和公开您的信息的方式。

trans-unit.source: No. Your identity is safe with us and is not for sale. We do not sell Personally Identifiable Information.

Aggregated information is information from multiple members that is not associated with any individual user account; statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account; de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run and improve the services provided on or through HealthTap. This information may also be used by us or provided to our partners for purposes of research and analysis.
trans-unit.target: 整合信息和去除标识的数据和统计信息用于运行和提高HealthTap提供的服务。

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can share certain information from HealthTap using sign-in services social media services such as Facebook and Twitter. Please consider any impact on your privacy and anonymity when posting content to public services. Content posted to these services will be governed by the respective privacy policies of those services.

Like most online services, HealthTap uses cookies. All browser cookies we use are encrypted. We use session ID cookies and persistent cookies to enable you to sign in and to help personalize HealthTap for you. Using cookies simplifies the delivery of relevant content and allows you to retrieve information you previously provided making use of HealthTap features easier. We link the information we store in session cookies to personally identifiable information you submit while on HealthTap. You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline some or all cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline all cookies, you may not be able to use interactive features of HealthTap or other websites that depend on cookies.
trans-unit.target: 许多网页浏览器自动接受cookies，但是您通常可以在您的浏览器设定中修改来按您的意愿拒绝一些或所有cookies。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap or the Medical Experts on HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers ("External Service Providers") that may be of interest or use to you. HealthTap does not provide these External Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent.
You may reach us by contacting our support team via email or you may write to us at our most current address. Please see our

We value your privacy. This Privacy Statement describes how we will protect and handle the personal information that you provide to us through our web, mobile and related services. Among other things, the HealthTap Privacy Statement explains:
trans-unit.target: 这个隐私权声明描述了我们将如何保护并处理您通过网络，手机和相关设备提供给我们的个人信息。

trans-unit.source: When we say we care about your privacy, we mean it. Privacy policies are important documents, but many people don't read them because they are too long, are confusing, or are written in 'legalese.'
trans-unit.target: 隐私政策是重要的文件，但许多人不读他们，因为他们太长，太复杂，或由法律术语书写而成。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, we’ve designed our Privacy Statement with our members in mind, creating links to the most common questions members may have about the site and how it works where privacy issues may be involved. We’ve also written everything in plain, understandable language.
trans-unit.target: 因此，考虑到我们的成员，我们设计了隐私声明。在关于网站的最常见的问题上，以及在工作中可能涉及到的隐私问题上，我们都创建了链接。

trans-unit.source: that describes our core beliefs about privacy and your core rights as a user of our site. These documents are located on our

trans-unit.source: Yes. Your account and Health Activity information are secure and password protected.
trans-unit.target: 是。您的账户和健康活动信息是安全并受密码保护的。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can close your account at any time by signing into your HealthTap account and choosing “Delete Account” from your Account Settings. You will receive an email confirming that your account has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能随时通过登录您的HealthTap账户并在账户设置中选择“删除账户”来关闭您的账户。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap allows members to “connect with” doctors. HealthTap does not reveal your real name or any other Personally Identifiable Information to doctors when you Follow or Connect with them. If you request a Private Conversation with an expert on HealthTap, and an expert accepts this request, your name and Health Activity will be visible to that expert.
trans-unit.target: 在您与医生联系沟通的过程中HealthTap不会向他们泄露您的真实姓名或其他个人可识别信息。如果您在HealthTap上请求与一位专家进行对话并获得许可，您的姓名与健康活动将对该名专家可见。

trans-unit.source: Yes. After you sign up for HealthTap, we will send you a message welcoming you to our community and thanking you for joining us. After that, HealthTap may occasionally send messages on the HealthTap message system or to an email address you provide to us. No one likes Spam, so we do not send our members Spam. As described elsewhere in this Privacy Statement, HealthTap may also send you notifications (which you can turn off) and important messages to the email address listed in your Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 是。在您注册了HealthTap账户后，我们将会向您发送邮件欢迎您加入我们的社区，同时对您的加入表达感谢。在注册之后，HealthTap会不时通过网站信息系统或您提供的邮箱地址向您发送信件。如前在这个隐私声明中所述，HealthTap会向您列在账户设置中的邮箱地址发送关于通知和重要消息的邮件。

trans-unit.source: Yes. While HealthTap does not monitor the information exchanged in Direct Messages/Private Conversations, HealthTap doctors are required to keep these communications confidential and private, much like they would for an in-person doctor-patient interaction.
trans-unit.target: 是。尽管HealthTap不监控直接信息和私人对话的交流，但是HealthTap的医生被要求对这些对话保密，就像他们是在做私人的医患互动。

trans-unit.source: Questions and answers on HealthTap are for general education and information. Only general, informational questions are permitted. For specific, personal health questions, always ask your own doctor or healthcare provider. (HealthTap Medical Experts are not your personal doctor or healthcare provider, and their answers to questions are not personal or for personal use.) For a small fee, you can also ask a specific HealthTap Medical Expert a question by starting a private health conversation [Conversation].
trans-unit.target: 对于具体的、私人的健康问题，请您咨询您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者。（HealthTap的医疗专家不是您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者，他们对于问题的答案也不是针对个人的或是可用作私人的。）您可以通过支付一笔较小的费用来与一名具体的HealthTap的医疗专家进行私下对话式的提问。

trans-unit.source: For a small fee, you can ask a question to a specific Medical Expert on HealthTap. The doctor has a limited period of time to respond. These questions are private (not visible on HealthTap to other members or doctors) and secure. The doctor you ask the question to will be able to see information contained within your Health Activity and can aslo see you real name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过支付一笔很小的费用来向HealthTap上一名具体的医疗专家提问。这些问题是隐私（对HealthTap上其他会员和医生不可见）且安全的。接受您询问的问题的医生将会有权看到您的健康活动信息和您的真实姓名。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Unlike publicly visible questions and answers on HealthTap, you can provide Personally Identifiable Information in an Episode question and follow up.
trans-unit.target: 是。与HealthTap上公开可见的的问题与答案不同，您可以在一个片段式问题及其跟进中提供个人可识别信息。

trans-unit.source: We use personal information collected through HealthTap, including health and wellness information, to enable the services we provide, and as described in this Privacy Statement. This Privacy Statement describes the ways that we use or disclose your information. In support of these uses, we may use personal information to:
trans-unit.target: 我们如在隐私声明中所述那样使用通过HealthTap收集的个人信息来使服务可行，包括健康信息。这份隐私声明描述了我们使用和公开您的信息的方式。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit or delete information in your Health Activity by signing in to your HealthTap account and editing your Health Activity. Once you edit or delete a record, you cannot retrieve it. Information in Private Conversations cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能通过登录您的HealthTap账户并编辑健康活动来对其信息进行编辑或删除。

trans-unit.source: We use cookies to enable you to sign in and to help personalize HealthTap. Using cookies simplifies the process of delivering relevant content and allows you to retrieve the information you previously provided, so that you can easily use the site's features. We use both session ID cookies and persistent cookies, and all browser Cookies we use are encrypted. We link the information we store in session cookies to personally identifiable information you submit while on our site. You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline some or all cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline all cookies, you may not be able to use interactive features of this or other web sites that depend on cookies.
trans-unit.target: 使用cookies简化了提供内容的过程，并允许您检索您以前提供的信息，以便您可以轻松地使用该网站的功能。我们同时使用会话识别cookies和持续性cookies，我们使用的所有浏览器cookies都是加密的。我们在网站上将您提交的个人可识别信息与我们储存在会话cookies中的信息连接起来。许多网页浏览器自动接受cookies，但是您通常可以在您的浏览器设定中修改来按您的意愿拒绝一些或所有cookies。如果您选择拒绝所有cookies，您可能不能使用基于cookies的这个或其他网站的互动特征。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not share your Personally Identifiable Information (for example, your real name or email address) with anyone unless you permit it. When you enter into a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap for a fee, you permit your Personally Identifiable Information to be made available to this doctor. HealthTap works by helping you find reliable and personalized health information. As part of this service, HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers (“Service Providers”) that may be of interest or use to you (for example, a health clinic). HealthTap does not provide these external Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent. Service Providers cannot access your Health Activity or other health and wellness information through HealthTap.

HCV Tests
Testing for Hepatitis C is simple, accessible, and supported by federal medical guidelines
. A HealthTap doctor can help determine if you meet these criteria.
most health insurance policies will cover the HCV test at no cost to you*

The CDC and the United States Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF) recommend that Baby Boomers (those born 1945–1965) and high-risk individuals get a simple blood test to screen for Hepatitis C Virus (HCV). If left untreated Hepatitis C can cause liver damage, cirrhosis, liver failure, and other medical problems. If you meet screening guidelines,

Affiliate wishes to promote Company’s services (“Affiliate’s Promotion”), described below (“Promoted Services”), and disseminate a customized Affiliate link provided to Affiliate by the company (“Affiliate Link”) to a landing page on the Company’s website and mobile apps (“Company Apps”) through which consumers can pay for the Promoted Services. Affiliate’s Promotion may take place through Affiliate’s website, apps, social media accounts, or other channels (“Affiliate Channels”).

a. Company shall provide Affiliate with a custom Affiliate Link directed to a specific landing page (the “Affiliate Landing Page”) on the Company’s website and/or mobile apps (the “Company Apps”). Affiliate agrees that Affiliate is only entitled to compensation, as further set forth herein, for customer sign ups generated directly from this Affiliate Link.

c. Commissions are held for a period of 2 months from any purchase to protect Company in the event of any chargeback that may occur. Company shall pay all Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate within fifteen (15) days of the first day of each month after such holdback period (the “Commission Payment Date”). Company may withhold any Commission payments as well as any actual chargeback fees for which the Company is liable that are generated through transactions from sign ups through the Affiliate Link (“Affiliate Chargeback Fees”), from any Commission Payments to Affiliate. If at any time Affiliate’s Commission Payments balance is negative as a result of Affiliate Chargeback Fees, Company may suspend or terminate the Affiliate Link or Affiliate’s participation in the Affiliate Program.

d. If on any Commission Payment Date, the amount of total Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate is less than $25.00, then such accrued and payable balance shall be held over to the following month, and paid together with the Commissions due for that month. If at any time, the balance of accrued and payable Commissions is held over for 2 consecutive months, then Company shall pay all accrued and payable Commissions to Affiliate in the third month, regardless of the total amount owed. Payment is made via the Affiliate PayPal account or other account permitted by Company. Affiliate is responsible for any payment processing or PayPal fees associated with delivery and receipt of payment and understands and agrees that payments received will be reduced by any such fees..
f. Nothing in this agreement guarantees that Affiliate will be successful or make any money under the program. Affiliate understands that no compensation is guaranteed for any efforts made.
trans-unit.target: 在这个协议中,没有任何条款保证附属公司会在项目中必然成功或者盈利.

trans-unit.source: b. Either Party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement at any time and for any cause. The Company may terminate this Agreement without notice. The Affiliate must give written notice to Company at least 30 days prior to the intended date of termination.

Remittances to the Practice shall be made on a regular basis, on or about the first of every month or otherwise as set forth in Schedule B. License Fees are subject to change at any time.

Each Party agrees that all information supplied by one Party and its affiliates and agents (collectively, the “Disclosing Party”) to the other (“Receiving Party”) including, without limitation, (i) source code, trade secrets, databases, designs and techniques, engine protocols, models, displays and manuals, and the selection, coordination, and arrangement of the contents of such materials; and (ii) any unpublished information concerning research activities and plans, customers, marketing or sales plans, sales forecasts or results of marketing efforts, pricing or pricing strategies, costs, operational techniques, strategic plans, and unpublished financial information, including information concerning revenues, profits and profit margins will be deemed confidential and proprietary to the Disclosing Party, regardless of whether such information was disclosed intentionally or unintentionally or marked as “confidential” or “proprietary” (“Confidential Information”). The Licensed Services shall be deemed Confidential Information of HealthTap.

. Confidential Information will not include any information or material, or any element thereof, whether or not such information or material is Confidential Information for the purposes of this Agreement, to the extent any such information or material, or any element thereof: (a) has previously become or is generally known, unless it has become generally known through a breach of this Agreement or a similar confidentiality or non- disclosure agreement, obligation or duty; (b) was already rightfully known to the Receiving Party prior to being disclosed by or obtained from the Disclosing Party as evidenced by written records kept in the ordinary course of business or by proof of actual use by the Receiving Party; (c) has been or is hereafter rightfully received by the Receiving Party from a third person (other than the Disclosing Party) without restriction or disclosure and without breach of a duty of confidentiality to the Disclosing Party; or (d) has been independently developed by the Receiving Party without access to Confidential Information of the Disclosing Party. It will be presumed that any Confidential Information in a Receiving Party’s possession is not within exceptions (b), (c) or (d) above, and the burden will be upon the Receiving Party to prove otherwise by records and documentation.

. Each Party recognizes the importance of the other’s Confidential Information. In particular, each Party recognizes and agrees that the Confidential Information of the other is critical to their respective businesses and that neither Party would enter into this Agreement without assurance that such information and the value thereof will be protected as provided in this Section 6 and elsewhere in this Agreement. Accordingly, each Party agrees as follows: (a) the Receiving Party will hold any and all Confidential Information it obtains in strictest confidence and will use and permit use of Confidential Information solely for the purposes of this Agreement; (b) the Receiving Party may disclose or provide access to its responsible employees who have a need to know and may make copies of Confidential Information only to the extent reasonably necessary to carry out its obligations hereunder; and (c) the Receiving Party currently has, and for so long as it possesses Confidential Information of the Disclosing Party, it will maintain in effect and enforce, rules and policies to protect against access to or use or disclosure of Confidential Information other than in accordance with this Agreement, including without limitation written instruction to and agreements with employees and agents who are bound by an obligation of confidentiality no less restrictive than set forth in this Agreement to ensure that such employees and agents protect the confidentiality of Confidential Information. The Receiving Party will instruct and require its employees and agents not to disclose Confidential Information to third parties, including without limitation customers, subcontractors or consultants, without the Disclosing Party’s prior written consent; and will notify the Disclosing Party immediately of any unauthorized disclosure or use, and will cooperate with the Disclosing Party to protect all proprietary rights in and ownership of its Confidential Information.

. Each Party acknowledges and agrees that due to the unique nature of Confidential Information there can be no adequate remedy at law for any breach of its obligations hereunder, that any such breach or threatened breach may allow a Party or third parties to unfairly compete with the other Party resulting in irreparable harm to such party, and therefore, that upon any such breach or any threat thereof, each Party will be entitled to appropriate equitable remedies and may seek and obtain injunctive relief from a court of competent jurisdiction without the necessity of proving actual loss or posting of a bond or other security, in addition to whatever remedies either of them might have at law or equity. trans-unit.source: “My son who's now 12 years old was born with several congenital issues. After several surgeries over the years, he's now a healthy child of 12 years. If I need any help or any tips, I find it on HealthTap, not only for him also for the whole family! It really helps!“

trans-unit.source: “I wish I had HealthTap Prime when my mom had a stroke and was in a coma. It would've been amazing to get an immediate second opinion instead of paying $1000 out of pocket. Now, I can use HealthTap in minutes for a virtual consult.“

trans-unit.source: “I love having my own private doctor on call, whenever I need him. All it takes is just a few taps on my smartphone. Best of all, I can consult with him via HD video or chat!“

trans-unit.source: Participants can pay for Private Conversations, and HealthTap shall collect these Conversation Fees. Subscribers can also provide Participants with a promotional code, which allow for a Private Conversation without a Conversation Fee (when such promotional codes are used, Subscriber shall not receive any compensation for any such interaction). Conversation Fees collected from Participants will be distributed to Subscriber by check or money transfer (using a service such as PayPal) after both (i) the total of the Subscriber’s Conversation Fees exceeds $100 (each a "Payment Distribution") and (ii) Subscriber request, and such distribution to Subscriber shall be the total of all collected Conversation Fees minus the applicable License and Subscription Fees. Conversation Fees and License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures
trans-unit.target: 参与者可以支付私人对话，HealthTap应收取这些对话费。订阅者还可以向参与者提供促销代码，允许在没有对话费的情况下进行私人对话（当使用此类促销代码时，订阅者不会因任何此类交互而获得任何补偿）。当（i）订户的对话费用总额超过100美元（每个为“付款分配”）和（ii）订阅者的要求和所有收集的对话费减去适用的许可和订阅费用的总和时，向参与者所收取的对话费会分发给订阅者来确认费用（比如使用paypal等服务）对话费和许可费和订阅费可根据HealthTap政策和程序进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon thirty (30) days written notice; upon such termination by Subscriber, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap and any such participation shall reinstate this agreement; upon such termination by HealthTap, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap. This Agreement may be terminated with cause (i) upon thirty (30) days written notice by non-breaching party of a material breach to the breaching party if such breach remains uncured at the expiration of such period; (ii) immediately, if a party becomes the subject of a petition in bankruptcy or any other proceeding relating to insolvency, receivership, liquidation or assignment for the benefit of creditors, (iii) immediately, upon notice by HealthTap upon a breach of any of Sections 3, 4 or 7(D).
trans-unit.target: 任何一方均可在三十（30）天书面通知后立即终止本协议; 在订户终止后，订户同意不再参与HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话，任何此类参与都将恢复本协议; 在HealthTap终止后，用户同意不再参加HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话。本协议可能因以下原因被终止：（i）如果违约行为在违约行为期限届满时仍未得到解决，则违约方在三十（30）天内书面通知重大违约行为; （ii）如果一方成为破产申请或与破产，接管，清算或转让有关的债权人的任何其他诉讼的主体，（iii）在HealthTap违反任何第3，4或7（D）条。

Each party represents and warrants that it has the legal power to enter into this Agreement. This Agreement does not create a partnership, joint venture, agency, fiduciary or employment relationship between the parties. This Agreement is the entire agreement between Subject and HealthTap relating to its subject matter, and replaces any prior agreements concerning its subject matter. If there is any conflict between this agreement and a mutually signed written agreement between HealthTap and Subscriber related to HealthTap, the signed written agreement will control. If HealthTap provides a translation of the English language version of this agreement, the English language version of this agreement will control if there is any conflict. If HealthTap chooses not to enforce any provision of this Agreement, HealthTap retains the right to enforce it in the future. This means that the failure to enforce any provision of this Agreement does not constitute a waiver of that provision. If any provision in this Agreement is found to be unenforceable, it and any related provisions will be interpreted to best accomplish the essential purpose of any unenforceable provision. Neither party may assign any of its rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written consent of the other party (not to be unreasonably withheld); provided, however, HealthTap may assign this Agreement without consent of Subscriber, in connection with a merger, acquisition, corporate reorganization, or sale of all or substantially all of its assets. Any attempt by a party to assign its rights or obligations under this Agreement in breach of this section shall be void. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall bind and inure to the benefit successors and permitted assigns. This agreement is governed by California law, excluding California's choice-of-law rules. THE EXCLUSIVE VENUE FOR ANY DISPUTE RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT IS SANTA CLARA COUNTY, CALIFORNIA. YOU AND US CONSENT TO THE PERSONAL JURISDICTION OF THESE COURTS. Nothing in this agreement limits either party's ability to seek equitable relief. All notices under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been given upon: (i) personal delivery; (ii) the second business day after mailing; (iii) the second business day after sending by confirmed facsimile; or (iv) if by HealthTap to Subscriber, the second business day after sending by email. Notices shall be directed to the party’s current known address, and if by email to HealthTap, to: notice@healthtap.com.

trans-unit.source: The License and Subscription Fee shall be the License and Subscription Fee Percentage. The License and Subscription Fee Percentage is a percentage of the Conversation Fee that ranges between Twenty and Twenty-Five Percent of the Conversation Fee based on the DocScore of the Subscriber. Each separate transaction in a Private Conversation, such as a question and a follow up question, shall each be subject to a Conversation Fee.

The Term of this Addendum shall be effective as of the commencement of the term of the Agreement, shall automatically renew with the Agreement, and shall terminate when the Agreement terminates. If this Addendum is amended, the Addendum shall renew as Amended.

We value your privacy, and this Privacy Statement describes how we will protect and handle the personal information that you provide to us through our HealthTap Web-based and mobile based service, and related web sites. Among other things, the HealthTap Privacy Statement explains:
. The TRUSTe program covers only information that is collected through this Web site.
. If you are not satisfied with our response you can contact
Can I send other users messages? Can they send me Messages?

Yes. Your use of HealthTap is anonymous. Your real name, date of birth, e-mail address, and other Personally Identifiable Information are not visible on the site to other users. You select a name under which you appear when using the Site (a Public Profile Name). You can stay anonymous by selecting a confidential Public Profile Name and by keeping that private. HealthTap uses bank-level security and encryption. More about our security measures can be found
trans-unit.target: 是。您的真实姓名、出生日期、电子邮件地址和其他个人身份信息不会显示给其他成员。您可以选择隐秘的公开资料名称并将其私有化，以保护您的隐私。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit the data in your Health Activity by changing or deleting it at any time. The changes you make are permanent. You will be asked to confirm any changes or deletions from your Health Activity before they are made final.
trans-unit.target: 是。

trans-unit.source: Every user has a Public Profile. Your Public Profile is how other users will see you on the Site. Your Public Profile is your Public Profile Name, and an image or avatar you choose (your Public Profile Picture). It does not contain any Personally Identifiable Information, unless you put such information in your Public Profile Name or Public Profile Picture. Do not use your real name, picture or any other Personally Identifiable Information in your Public Profile Name and avatar. Each user’s Public Profile is linked to that user’s Health Activity, so that all users on the Site can find similar Public Profiles, and so that we can all share in communal health learning.

As this example shows, some of the information stored in you Health Activity is displayed in your Public Profile. Your real name, and other Personally Identifiable Information, are never shown in your Public Profile (unless you put it there). You can turn off sharing of various site features, including Health Activity sharing, at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您的真实姓名和其他个人可识别信息将不会显示在您的公开形象中。（除非您将它们置于此处。）

Yes. Every user of HealthTap, whether or not the user is a caregiver or care recipient, must have a different account. Currently, a parent may add a separate child’s account through their account.

trans-unit.source: Each HealthTap user has a Public Profile. HealthTap allows users to find other people who are similar to them by navigating through the site. Each user's Public Profile contains information that is visible to other users on HealthTap. To protect your identity, your real name or other Personally Identifiable Information is never displayed in your Public Profile.

When one user follows another, the follower will see certain information about the user being followed. This information includes certain updates that the user being followed provides to HealthTap and that appear in the Public Profile of the user being followed.

No one likes Spam, we do not send our users Spam, and we have a strict No-Spam policy. Aggregated information is information from multiple users that is not associated with any individual user account, statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account, and de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information, such as first and last names or e-mail addresses. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run our service. We may use aggregated information or de-identified data gathered from HealthTap and related statistics to improve the services provided through HealthTap, and for research and analysis. We may also provide this information to our partners for such purposes.

You have jock itch, so buy some OTC Lotrimin cream and use it twice a day for 2 weeks. Keep your groin dry, and your rash should be gone in a couple of weeks.

Itchy, reddened, slightly flaky skin in the groin skin folds can be from jock itch or other causes. Jock itch (tinea cruris) is caused by a fungus germ, and is usually treated with over-the-counter Lotrimin AF cream or with prescription anti-fungal medication from a doctor.

Judgment Filed

You, a physician applying to or currently providing virtual consults on HealthTap or any physician on whose behalf this Agreement is entered into (“Provider”), agree to designate HealthTap to purchase and maintain malpractice insurance with a minimum annual coverage of one million dollars per incident and three million dollars in aggregate, or HealthTap’s subsequent liability minimums, to cover any acts of malpractice committed during the performance of virtual consults on HealthTap, subject to any limitations specified herein or in the policy (“Insurance”). Generally, the Insurance provides claims-made coverage for medical malpractice claims brought in the U.S., including U.S. claims made by claimants in other countries. The coverage excludes consults or interactions outside of the HealthTap platform, claims brought outside of the U.S., and is not available to Providers with no other means of participating in a Patient Compensation Fund (“PCF”) program if the Provider practices in a state where PCF participation is required. The Insurance is secondary to any other applicable or available insurance policy. Provider agrees to provide to HealthTap or the Insurance carrier, upon request, information related to your medical practice, licensure, or events or circumstances likely to impact coverage eligibility. This agreement is in addition to any other agreements governing use of the HealthTap platform, and any representations and warranties therein. In the event of a claim covered or potentially covered by the Insurance and related to services provided under this Agreement and on or through a HealthTap platform (including the HealthTap website and mobile apps), Provider agrees to comply with the terms required by the Insurance to receive the benefit of coverage and to: (i) cooperate with the investigation, settlement of defense of any claim(s); (ii) immediately send HealthTap copies of any demands, notices, summons or legal papers received in connection with a claim; (iii) notify any other insurer whose coverage is or may be available; (iv) cooperate with the insurer with respect to coordinating any other available or potentially available insurance; (v) provide the insurer with written authorization to (a) obtain records and other information related to the claim, and (b) conduct and control the defense of the Physician in such claim. By opting into this program, Provider agrees that HealthTap may withhold an additional administrative fee for the provision of this service from any payments to Provider. Currently this fee is one dollar ($1) per consult, on top of any other fees applicable to the performance of consults through the HealthTap platform. Provider may opt out of this coverage at any time, but waiting periods may apply to any future request to participate in this program. HealthTap retains the rights to end this program or to end Provider’s participation in this program at any time and for any reason, and shall provide Provider with written notice of any such termination, in which case coverage shall apply to virtual consults up to the date of such termination.
